Ao ntira wa Gago Morw’a Modimo.
E Wena kea Go batla Ka dinako tsotlhe.
Ntshegofatsa Mmoloki, Ke tla go Wena.
Gotlhe Go Jeso Kea Ineela Ka Kgololego;
Ke tla Mo rata ka metlha, Ke ikanye go Ene.
Kea ineela, Ke latlha tsotlhe;
Gotlhe go Wena Mmoloki kea ineela
Gotlhe Kea Ineela Jeso, Ka Obama Dinaong;
Boitumelo jwa lefatshe, Ke bo latlhile ntsaya.
Kea ineela, Ke latlha tsotlhe;
Gotlhe go Wena Mmoloki kea ineela
Gotlhe Kea Ineela Jeso Mmoloki Ntira Wa ’Go;
Ke utlwe mo’a o boitshepo, Ke itse gore O’a me.
Kea ineela, Ke latlha tsotlhe;
Gotlhe go Wena Mmoloki kea ineela
Gotlhe Kea Ineela Jeso, Ke Utlwa Mo’a Boitshepo.
Boitumelo jwa poloko, Kgalalelo ’ineng ja ’Gwe.
Kea ineela, Ke latlha tsotlhe;
Gotlhe go Wena Mmoloki kea ineela
Jaaka Ke Ntse, Mo Molatong,
Mme madi a ’Go a ntlhatswa,
Mme O mpiletsa go Wena,
Kwana ya Modimo, k’ etla.
Jaaka Ke Ntse, Ke Sa Leta
Go ntsha sebe moeeng wa me,
G’Wena yo tlhatswang ka madi,
Kwana ya Modimo, k’ etla.
Jaaka Ke Ntse, Ke Akgega
Dintweng tsa dingongorego -
Tsa mo teng, poifo ka ko ntle,
Kwana ya Modimo, k’ etla
Jaaka Ke Ntse, Bohutsaneng,
Pono, khumo le phodiso.
E, tsotlhe ke ya di tlhoka,
Kwana ya Modimo, k’ etla
Jaaka Ke Ntse, O Tla Ntsaya,
O intshwarele, O ntlhatswe,
Gonne O solofeditse,
Kwana ya Modimo, k’ etla.
Jaaka Ke Ntse, ’Rato Lwa ’Go,
Lo thubile dilo tsotlhe
Ke tla nna wa Gago fela,
Kwana ya Modimo, k’ etla.
Re Ya Go Baka Modimo Ka Morwa
Ka Jeso Yo’ suleng mme O tsogile.
Halelujah kgalalelo, Haleluja amen
Haleluja kgalalelo, Re tsose gape
Re Ya Go Baka Modimo Ka Moya
’Sedi je le re bontshitseng Mmoloki
Halelujah kgalalelo, Haleluja amen
Haleluja kgalalelo, Re tsose gape
Kgalalelo Go Kwana E Tlhabilweng
Yo’ belegeng dibe tsotlhe tsa rona.
Halelujah kgalalelo, Haleluja amen
Haleluja kgalalelo, Re tsose gape
Kgalalelo Go Modimo O Tshwaro,
Yo’ re rekileng A re etelela.
Halelujah kgalalelo, Haleluja amen
Haleluja kgalalelo, Re tsose gape
Re Tsose Gape Re Tlatse Lorato,
Re tsosiwe ka molelo wa godimo.
Halelujah kgalalelo, Haleluja amen
Haleluja kgalalelo, Re tsose gape
O Tsee Lobaka Go Itshepisiwa,
Bua Le Morena Nna Fokung ja ’Gwe;
Tsala’a ba Modimo, Thusa bokoeng,
Se lebale gope masego a ’Gwe.
O Tsee Lobaka Go Itshepisiwa,
Lefatshe lea duma, Bua le Jeso
Ka go leba Jeso, Tshwana le Ene;
Ditsala tsa gago Di Mmone g’wena.
O Tsee Lobaka Go Itshepisiwa,
A go etelele Mo dilong tsotlhe;
Thamong bohutsaneng, Latela Jeso,
O lebile Ene, O Mo ikanye.
O Tsee Lobaka Go Itshepisiwa,
O ingotle Moeeng, A go laole;
O isiwa metsweding ya lorato
O tla tshwanela tirelo godimo.
Sala Le Nna: Tsatsi Lea Phirima;
Go ya ntshofala; Morena sala:
Fa go se bathusi le kgomotso,
Thuso ya batlhoki, sala le nna.
Botshelo Bo Feta Ka Bonako;
Thamo le tlotlo tsa ’fatshe jeno;
Tsotlhe dia feta di ya nyelela,
Wena Yo sa feteng sala le nna.
Ga Ke Kope Foko Je Le Fetang,
Mme jaak’ O ntse le barutwa Jeso,
Kgomotso ka bopelotelele,
Tla mme O se ete sala le nna.
Ke Go Batla Ka Dinako Tsotlhe,
Tshwaro ya ’Go ’ka fenya Satane.
Ke mang yo’ tla nkgogang jaaka Wena?
Botlhokung, kgatlhegong, sala le nna
Fa O Le Teng Ke Tlelwa Ke Thata;
Le khutsafalo ga e botlhoko;
Ga ke tshabe loso le lebitla;
Kea di Fenya fa O sala le nna.
Tsatsi Le Ya Phirima; Boikhutso Jwa Godimo:
Obamang fa bosigo Bo bonesa dipone Legodimong.
O boitshepo More-na Modimo!
Legodimo lefatshe di baka Wena Mogodimo-dimo.
Morena Oa Botshelo, Tlase Ga Gae Ja Gago,
Rona ba re Go batlang, Re phuthele sakeng,
Gonne O gaufi.
O boitshepo More-na Modimo!
Legodimo lefatshe di baka Wena Mogodimo-dimo.
Fa Lefifi Le Tsena, Re Tsee Ratong Lwa Gago,
Kgalalelong le tshwarong Ya losire lwa Gago r’a tlhatloga
O boitshepo More-na Modimo!
Legodimo lefatshe di baka Wena Mogodimo-dimo.
Fa Dinaledi, ’Tsatsi, Bosigo, Di Nyelela,
Moren’a ba’ngele re Senolele moso wa bosakhutleng
O boitshepo More-na Modimo!
Legodimo lefatshe di baka Wena Mogodimo-dimo.
Tsatsi Ja Mo’a Me Mmoloki; Ga Go ’Sigo Fa O Le Teng
Go se nne ’ru ja lefatshe, Go Go fitlha matlhong a me.
Fa Ke Tlelwa Ke Boroko, Matlho A Me A Otsela
Mogopolo wa me, fubeng Sa Mmoloki o ikhutse
Nna Le Nna Le Maitsiboeng, Ka Nosi Ga Nke Ke Tshela;
Sala le nna go bosigo, Gonne ga ke batle go ’swa.
Ntshegofatse Fa Ke Tsoga, Ke Tsamaya Mo Lefatshing;
Loratong lwa Gago ke bo Ke tsene kwa legodimong.
Morena Fika Ja Rona, Phemelo Tsatsing Ja Phefo
Re boloke mo dintelong, Phemelo tsatsing ja phefo.
Lefika ’le nonofileng, Moruti kwa go mogote,
Moeteledi wa rona, Phemelo tsatsing ja phefo.
Sekhukhu Le Tshireletso, Phemelo Tsatsing Ja Phefo;
Ga go poifo ya mmaba, Phemelo tsatsing ja phefo.
Lefika ’le nonofileng, Moruti kwa go mogote,
Moeteledi wa rona, Phemelo tsatsing ja phefo.
Morwalela Lefa O Tla, Phemelo Tsatsing Ja Phefo;
Re iphitlha mo Modimong, Phemelo tsatsing ja phefo
Lefika ’le nonofileng, Moruti kwa go mogote,
Moeteledi wa rona, Phemelo tsatsing ja phefo.
Lefika Je Le Boitshepo, Phemelo Tsatsing Ja Phefo
O nna mothusi wa rona, Phemelo tsatseng ja phefo
Lefika ’le nonofileng, Moruti kwa go mogote,
Moeteledi wa rona, Phemelo tsatsing ja phefo.
O A Nkgoga: Go Gontle Jang:
Lefoko je le gomotsang:
Se ke se dirang, kwa ke yang,
Ke gogwa ke Modimo teng.
O a nkgoga, O a nkgoga,
Ka seatla sa ’Gwe Oa nkgoga:
Ke tla Mo sala morago,
Go bo ke Ene Yo’ nkgogang.
Lefa Ke Eta Lefifing,
Gongwe bontleng jwa Edene,
Metseng mantle, le dintelong,
Ke ntse ke gogwa ke Ene.
O a nkgoga, O a nkgoga,
Ka seatla sa ’Gwe Oa nkgoga:
Ke tla Mo sala morago,
Go bo ke Ene Yo’ nkgogang.
Morena Nka Tshwara ’Atla
Sa ’Go ke Sa ngongorege,
Ke itumela mo tseleng,
Ka ke gogwa ke Modimo.
O a nkgoga, O a nkgoga,
Ka seatla sa ’Gwe Oa nkgoga:
Ke tla Mo sala morago,
Go bo ke Ene Yo’ nkgogang.
Fa Tiro’a Me E Fedile,
Phenyo ke e bona tshwarong,
Ga nke ke tshaba le loso,
Modimo’ nkgoga Jordane.
O a nkgoga, O a nkgoga,
Ka seatla sa ’Gwe Oa nkgoga:
Ke tla Mo sala morago,
Go bo ke Ene Yo’ nkgogang.

title: Fa Kagiso E Le Mo Tseleng

lines: Fa Kagiso E Le Mo Tseleng Ya Me,
Fa bohutsana bo le teng
Lefa go nna jang, O nthutile, go re,
Ke re "Go sego moeng wa me."
Go sego Mo moeng,
Go sego, go sego mo moeng.
Fa Satane A Ntshwenya, Go Tla Diteko,
Ke nne le mogopolo o,
Gore Jeso o nkutlwela botlhoko,
O ntshololetse madi a ’Gwe.
Go sego Mo moeng,
Go sego, go sego mo moeng.
Ka Boleo Ke Tletse Boitumelo:
Boleo jwa me ka bojotlhe
Bo kokothetswe mokgorong wa Gagwe;
Baka Morena moya wa me.
Go sego Mo moeng,
Go sego, go sego mo moeng.
Jeso Akofisa Pono’a Tumelo,
Le ya go tlos’wa ga maru
’Naka lo lele Morena’ fologe,
Le gone go sego mo moeng.
Go sego Mo moeng,
Go sego, go sego mo moeng.
A Botsalano, Boitumelo,
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng;
A go masego, kagiso ya me,
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng.
Ikaege (go Jeso Morena)
O bolokege ka gotlhe
Ikaege (go Jeso Morena)
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng
Monate Go Tsama’a Loetong Lo,
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng
Go lesedi jang tseleng ka metlha,
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng
Ikaege (go Jeso Morena)
O bolokege ka gotlhe
Ikaege (go Jeso Morena)
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng
Ke Tla Tshaba Eng, Ke Boife Eng,
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng?
Ke na le kagiso mo Moreneng,
Mo mabogong a busakhutleng.
Ikaege (go Jeso Morena)
O bolokege ka gotlhe
Ikaege (go Jeso Morena)
Mo mabogong a bosakhutleng
Ke Leba Go Wena, Kwana’ Khalefari,
Ao Mmoloki:
Nkutlwa mo thapelong, O ntlose melato,
Go tswa gompieno ke nne wa ’Go.
Tshwaro Ya Gago A E Nnee Nonofo,
E ntlhoafatse;
Mme jaaka O ntshwetse, Ao, Lorato lwa me,
A lo se fetoge, A lo tshele.
Tseleng E Lefifi Le Mo Bohutsaneng,
Wena nkgoga;
O tlose lefifi, phimola ’keledi,
O se nteseletse Ka tswa g’Wena.
Gaufi Le Modimo Wame, Gaufi:
Le e le mokgoro O ntsholetsang:
Ke tla nna k’opela, Gaufi le Modimo,
Gaufi le Modimo wame, gaufi.
Ke Le Motimedi, Go Se ’Sedi,
Lefifi, le mpipa, Ke sama ’ntswe
Le mo ’torong tsa me, Ke tla nna gaufi,
Gaufi le Modimo wame, gaufi
A Go Nne Le Tsela E Tlhatlogang,
Gotlhe mo’ nthometseng, Go neilwe tshwarong;
Ba’ngele ba mpitsa Gore ke ye gaufi,
Gaufi le Modimo wame, gaufi.
Foo Mogopolong Wa Me Ka Pako,
Ke tswa bohutsaneng, K’age Bethela
Ke tla nna k’opela, Gaufi le Modimo,
Gaufi le Modimo wame, gaufi.
Tlhomamang Lo Emele Modimo,
Modumong wa ntwa, le mo dintelong;
Ke ’Fika fela, je le nonotshang,
Fa sebe se le gaufi
A re emeng ’Fikeng, Re tlhomame, Fikeng,
Lefikeng ja ga Kresete
Mme fa re itshoka, Re tla tlhomama,
Gare ga ba’ mo teroneng.
Tlhomamang Lo Emele Tshiamo,
Lo itsheke pelo, lo nne tumelong;
Ke Lefika je le nayang phenyo,
Diphosong tsa lefatshe.
A re emeng ’Fikeng, Re tlhomame, Fikeng,
Lefikeng ja ga Kresete
Mme fa re itshoka, Re tla tlhomama,
Gare ga ba’ mo teroneng.
Tlhomamang Mme Lo Emele Nnete,
E tla lo thusa, lefa e diega;
Ke ’Fika je le nayang kagiso,
Fa go fetile phefo.
A re emeng ’Fikeng, Re tlhomame, Fikeng,
Lefikeng ja ga Kresete
Mme fa re itshoka, Re tla tlhomama,
Gare ga ba’ mo teroneng.
Tsholofelo Ya Me E Mading Le Tshiamong Ya Jeso
Ga ke ikanye bonna, mme Ke ikaega go Jeso.
Ke eme Lefikeng je le Tlhomameng go Keresete;
Mmu o mongwe ke mosawa
Fa Lefifi Le Mo Sira, Ke Ikhutsa Tshwarong Ya ’Gwe;
Mo sefefong se se tona, Ke tlhomame mo go Ene.
Ke eme Lefikeng je le Tlhomameng go Keresete;
Mmu o mongwe ke mosawa
Ikano, Kgolagano Le Madi A Gagwe Dia Nthusa;
Fa batho botlhe ba ntatlha, K’ Ene tsholofelo ya me.
Ke eme Lefikeng je le Tlhomameng go Keresete;
Mmu o mongwe ke mosawa
Fa A Tla Ka Loshalaba, Ao, Ke Fitlhelwe Go Ene;
Ke apesitswe tshiamo, Ke eme gaufi teroneng.
Ke eme Lefikeng je le Tlhomameng go Keresete;
Mmu o mongwe ke mosawa
Fa Re Tsamaya Le Morena Mo ’Seding,
Kgalalelo tseleng ya rona,
Fa re dira thato Ya Gagwe, O tla nna
Le rona, le ba ikanyang ba utlwa.
Ikanye, utlwa, gonne ga go tsela
Go itumela go Jeso, Kwa ntle ga go utlwa.
Go Ka Nna Moruti, Lefa E Le Leru,
Di tlos’wa ke go nyenya ga ’Gwe.
Ga go pelaelo, Poifo, ’keledi,
Tse di nnang fa re le boikanyo.
Ikanye, utlwa, gonne ga go tsela
Go itumela go Jeso, Kwa ntle ga go utlwa.
Ga Go Na Morwalo Le Kutlo Botlhoko,
O duela tiro ya rona;
Ga go bohutsana, Tatlhego, Khutlugo,
Go sego fa re le boikanyo.
Ikanye, utlwa, gonne ga go tsela
Go itumela go Jeso, Kwa ntle ga go utlwa.
Mme Ga Re Na Tshupo, Ya ’Rato Lwa Gagwe,
Fa re ise re latlhe tsotlhe.
Gonne tsalano le Boipelo Onayang,
Ke tsa ba ba ikanyang ba utlwa
Ikanye, utlwa, gonne ga go tsela
Go itumela go Jeso, Kwa ntle ga go utlwa.
Foo Mo Botsalanong, Re Tla Nna Dinaong,
Gongwe re tsamae le Ene;
Re dira ta’o ya ’Gwe, Re ya thomong ya ’Gwe,
Go se poifo boikanyong
Ikanye, utlwa, gonne ga go tsela
Go itumela go Jeso, Kwa ntle ga go utlwa.

title: Modimo O Nne Le Lona Lotlhe

lines: Modim’o Nne Le Lona Lotlhe;
O tshegetse, O kaele;
Mo sakeng O lo boloke;
Re tsamae re be re rakane.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Dinaong tsa ga Jeso.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Modim’o nne le lona lotlhe
Modim’o Nne Le Lona Lotlhe;
Phukeng ts’ One O lo fitlhe,
Ka mana O lo tlamele,
Re tsamae re be re rakane.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Dinaong tsa ga Jeso.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Modim’o nne le lona lotlhe
Modim’o Nne Le Lona Lotlhe,
Tlalelong O lo femele,
Mabogong O lo dibele;
Re tsamae re be re rakane.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Dinaong tsa ga Jeso.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Modim’o nne le lona lotlhe
Modim’o Nne Le Lona Lotlhe,
Loratong O lo tsholetse,
Mme O lo fapose loso;
Re tsamae re be re rakane.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Dinaong tsa ga Jeso.
Re be re rakane, re be re rakane,
Modim’o nne le lona lotlhe
Boitumelong Re Rakana Le Ditsala Mo Fatshing
Mme go tla mogopolo wa gore re tla kgaogana.
Ga re ka ke ra kgaogana Gone legodimong,
Kwa fatshing ja boitumelo, Ga re na kgaogano
Go Boipelo Tsholofelo Fa Baratwi Ba Tloga,
Gore bokhutlong rona le bona re tla nna mmogo.
Ga re ka ke ra kgaogana Gone legodimong,
Kwa fatshing ja boitumelo, Ga re na kgaogano
Ga Go Taetso E Ka Buiwang Gaeeng Je Lentle Jele,
Mme re tla opela kopelo Tsa kagiso gone.
Ga re ka ke ra kgaogana Gone legodimong,
Kwa fatshing ja boitumelo, Ga re na kgaogano
Robala Segong Go Jeso,
Mo go seng ope yo’ lelang;
Boikhutsong jwa tidimalo,
Jo bo sa sengweng ke mmaba.
Robalela Mo Go Jeso,
Kotselong e e monate
Go ikhutsa boitshepong,
Tsholofelong e sa khutleng
Robala Kagisong Ya ’Gwe,
Yo’ tsogo ya ’Gwe ’leng sego
Ga go poifo, tatlhego
Mo nonofong ya Mmoloki.
Robala Mme O Tla Tsoga,
Naka lo gelebetega;
Foo o phatlole bobipo
Mme o tsoge ka bosasweng.

title: Fa Tiro Ya Me E Fedile

lines: Fa Tiro Ya Me E Fedile, Ke Tlola Noka
"Mo go swang mo go apara, bosasweng,"
Ke tla itse Morekolodi moseja ole,
Ene O tla intumelela pele
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ke rekolotswe ke eme Nae,
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ka dipadi diatleng tsa ’Gwe.
A Boitumelo Jwa Legodimo Fa Ke Mmona,
Mo kgalalelong le bopelonoming;
Pel’a me e tla Mmakela tshwaro le lorato
Lo lo mpaakanyetsang bonno godimo.
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ke rekolotswe ke eme Nae,
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ka dipadi diatleng tsa ’Gwe.
Baratwi Ba Ba Ileng Kea Ba Gakologelwa,
Jaaka ba ne ba laela molapong;
Re tla rakanela ruri monateng Edene,
K’eletsa go bona Mmoloki pele
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ke rekolotswe ke eme Nae,
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ka dipadi diatleng tsa ’Gwe.
Ka Dikgoro Tsa Motse, Ke Le Mo Kobong E Tshweu,
O tla ntsenya mo go seng dikeledi;
Kopelong ya boitumelo ke tla ipela;
K’eletsa go rakana le Mmoloki.
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ke rekolotswe ke eme Nae,
Ke tla Mo itse, Ke tla Mo itse,
Ka dipadi diatleng tsa ’Gwe.
Mpha Bibela Lesedi Ja Boipelo,
Go gomotsa motimedi phefong;
Ga go sefefo se se ka le fitlhang,
Gonne Jes’ o tsile go boloka.
Mpha Bibela thomo e boitshepo,
Lesedi ja Gago le tla nkgoga.
Tao, tsholofetso lorato mmogo,
Go bo go tswe tsatsi le sa khutleng.
Mpha Bibela Fa Ke Lo Mo Tlalelong
Fa boleo bo ntlatsa poifo;
Mpha mafoko a builweng ke Jeso,
Tsholetsa lobone lwa tumelo.
Mpha Bibela thomo e boitshepo,
Lesedi ja Gago le tla nkgoga.
Tao, tsholofetso lorato mmogo,
Go bo go tswe tsatsi le sa khutleng.
Mpha Bibela, Mme Mponesetsa Tsela,
Nthuta kotsi ya dipuso tseno;
Bone lole lwa poloko lo tuke,
Lo bonese tsela ya kagiso.
Mpha Bibela thomo e boitshepo,
Lesedi ja Gago le tla nkgoga.
Tao, tsholofetso lorato mmogo,
Go bo go tswe tsatsi le sa khutleng.
Mpha Bibela Lobone Lwa Botshelo,
Lo tsholetse phupung e e butsweng
Mpontsa lesedi ja kwa legodimong,
Mpontsha kgalalelo kwa Jordane
Mpha Bibela thomo e boitshepo,
Lesedi ja Gago le tla nkgoga.
Tao, tsholofetso lorato mmogo,
Go bo go tswe tsatsi le sa khutleng.
Lo A Nkopelele Gape, ’Foko A Botshelo;
Ke bone bontle jwa one, ’Foko a Botshelo;
’Foko a botshelo, A nthuta tumelo.
A mantle jang, kgakgamatso, ’Foko a Botshelo,
A mantle jang, kgakgamatso, ’Foko a Botshelo;
Jeso Mmoloki O Lerile, ’Foko A Botshelo;
Reetsang pitso tsa lorato,’ Foko a Botshelo;
Ke a neo fela, Re bidiwa godimo,
A mantle jang, kgakgamatso, ’Foko a Botshelo,
A mantle jang, kgakgamatso, ’Foko a Botshelo;
Bolelang Bontle Jwa Pitso,’ Foko A Botshelo;
Boitshwerelo go botlhe,’ Foko a Botshelo;
Jeso ke Mmoloki, O ya re itshepisa....
A mantle jang, kgakgamatso, ’Foko a Botshelo,
A mantle jang, kgakgamatso, ’Foko a Botshelo;
Nokeng Ya Jordane K’ema, Ke Leba K’eletsa.
Kwa Kanana boitumelong, Kwa khumo ya me e teng.
Re tla ikhutsa boitumelong, (kgantele)
Kwa moseja, kwa bophatsimong, (phatsimong)
Re opela pina ya Moshe le Kwana,
Re nne le Jeso kwa O teng.
Gone Kwa Mabaleng Ale Go Nna Kgalalelong,
Jeso Letsatsi Oa busa, O tlosa bosigo.
Re tla ikhutsa boitumelong, (kgantele)
Kwa moseja, kwa bophatsimong, (phatsimong)
Re opela pina ya Moshe le Kwana,
Re nne le Jeso kwa O teng.
Ke Tla Fitlha Leng Kwa Bontleng Mme Ke Segofale?
Ke tla bona leng Rara teng, Ke nne ’gosing jwa Gwe.
Re tla ikhutsa boitumelong, (kgantele)
Kwa moseja, kwa bophatsimong, (phatsimong)
Re opela pina ya Moshe le Kwana,
Re nne le Jeso kwa O teng.
Ke Tletse Boitumelo, Ga Nka Ke Ka Nna Fa;
Dintelong tsa kwa Jordane, Ke tlola go se poifo.
Re tla ikhutsa boitumelong, (kgantele)
Kwa moseja, kwa bophatsimong, (phatsimong)
Re opela pina ya Moshe le Kwana,
Re nne le Jeso kwa O teng.
Go Tla Boitumelo Bofelong, Fa Barobi Ba Fitlha Gae,
Ba tlisa diako maitsiboa Gone kwa Jerusalem.
Boitumelo kgantele, Boitumelo bo ’sa sweng;
Boitumelo gaufi Badiri ba tla ya gae.
Botshe Kopelo Tse’ Tla Opelwang, Opelwang, Boitumelo
mo dipelong
Re baka Jeso Morena Motseng wa Jerusalem.
Boitumelo kgantele, Boitumelo bo ’sa sweng;
Boitumelo gaufi Badiri ba tla ya gae.
Re Letiwe Ke Boitumelo, Mannong A Mantsi A Gouda;
Jeso Oa re baakanyetsa, Gone kwa Jerusalem.
Boitumelo kgantele, Boitumelo bo ’sa sweng;
Boitumelo gaufi Badiri ba tla ya gae.
Go Tla Mogopolo, Go Nna O Masisi;
Ke gaufi gae gompieno Go gaisa gale.
Gaufi gae, Legae ja me;
Gaufi gae gompieno, Go gaisa gale.
Gaufi Tlung Ya Rara, Kwa Mannong A Mantsi;
Gaufi kwa Jeso O busang, Lewatleng je lentle.
Gaufi gae, Legae ja me;
Gaufi gae gompieno, Go gaisa gale.
Ke Gaufi Go Gae, Ke Rola Morwalo,
Mokgoro wa bohutsana, ke rwala serwalo.
Gaufi gae, Legae ja me;
Gaufi gae gompieno, Go gaisa gale.

title: Re Tla Nna Metsing A Tshedileng

lines: Re Tla Nna Metsing A Tshedileng,
Motsweding o montle;
Gone Jeso o re letile, Go re amogela.
Re tla nna metsing a tshedileng,
’Tla nna metsing a tshedileng
Re nna metsing a tshedileng,
Motsweding wa botshelo.
(T. & B.)
Re tla nna motsweding o o tshedileng,
Re tla nna motsweding o tshedileng;
Re tla nna motsweding O tshedileng,
Motsweding wa botshelo.
Fa Re Lapile Mo Loetong,
Go botshe go ikhutsa,
Mo metsing a mantle a dumang,
Metsweding e nyenyang.
Re tla nna metsing a tshedileng,
’Tla nna metsing a tshedileng
Re nna metsing a tshedileng,
Motsweding wa botshelo.
(T. & B.)
Re tla nna motsweding o o tshedileng,
Re tla nna motsweding o tshedileng;
Re tla nna motsweding O tshedileng,
Motsweding wa botshelo.
Foo Tla Go Jeso Mo Botshelong,
O tla go nonotsha;
Lekela poloko ya Gagwe,
O nwe O se nyorwe.
Re tla nna metsing a tshedileng,
’Tla nna metsing a tshedileng
Re nna metsing a tshedileng,
Motsweding wa botshelo.
(T. & B.)

Motsweding wa botshelo.
Fa Jeso A Phutha Merafe,
Pel’a Gagwe go bonala,
Foo re tla ema jang Katlholong,
Fa re bid’wa go utluwa?
O tla phutha mabele segotlong,
Mme mmoko O tla o gasaka;
Foo re tla ema jang Katlholong,
Tsatsing legolo ja tsogo?
A Re Tla Utlwa Mo Mmoloking,
Go twe "O dirile sentle,"
Gongwe re roroma ka poifo,
Re nyelediwe pel’a Gagwe.
O tla phutha mabele segotlong,
Mme mmoko O tla o gasaka;
Foo re tla ema jang Katlholong,
Tsatsing legolo ja tsogo?
O Tla Nyenya Fa A Leba Bana,
A bona lotshwao lwa Gagwe;
O ba pesa bontle jwa godimo,
Ba khubame naong tsa Gagwe.
O tla phutha mabele segotlong,
Mme mmoko O tla o gasaka;
Foo re tla ema jang Katlholong,
Tsatsing legolo ja tsogo?
Foo A Re Leteng, Mme Re Diseng,
Dipone di ntse di tuka;
Fa Monyadi A tsena modirong,
Re tshwanelwe ke go fofa.
O tla phutha mabele segotlong,
Mme mmoko O tla o gasaka;
Foo re tla ema jang Katlholong,
Tsatsing legolo ja tsogo?
Dipelo Di Lebile Godimo,
Re itshoketse lobaka,
’Eto lwa rona fa lo fedile,
Re tla ’ramela boitshepong.
O tla phutha mabele segotlong,
Mme mmoko O tla o gasaka;
Foo re tla ema jang Katlholong,
Tsatsing legolo ja tsogo?
Ga Ke Re Sepe Khumo, Lefa E Le Gouda;
Ke senka legodimo, Ke tsene lesakeng;
Kwalong lwa gosi jwa Go, Lo lo lontle thatha,
Mpolelela Mmoloki, A ke kwadilwe teng?
A ke kwadilwe teng, Mo tsebeng tse di tshweu?
Kwalong lwa gosi jwa ’Go, A ke kwadilwe teng?
Morena Ke Mo Dibeng, Di Jaaka Mosawa,
Mme madi a Mmoloki, A intekanetse;
Go, na le tsholofetso, tlhakeng tse ’phatsimang,

title: Ke Nne Le Mmoloki Go Nna

Fa Nna Ke Neng Ke Timetse,
Ke na le boitshwarelo;
Ga nka ke ka ikgodisa ,
Ke bolokwa mo mokgorong.
Fa Bopo Lotlhe’ Le Lwa Me,
Go k’o ne go sa lekana;
Lorato lo lo boitshepo,
Lo lopa botshelo jwa me.

title: Re Na Le Tsala Go Jeso

lines: Re Na Le Tsala Go Jeso, O Rwele ’Be Tsa Rona;
Ke lobaka lo lontle jang Modimong ka thapelo;
Gantsi re tlhaela kagiso, Ka mo go sa tshwanelang,
Gonne re sa ise tsotlhe Go Modimo thapelong.
A Re Na Le Dithaelo? A Go Teng Matshwenyego?
Re se ka ra ngodiega, Go Morena thapelong.
A re ka bona kae tsala, E e re hutsafalelang
Jeso O re itse bokoeng; Go Morena thapelong.
A Re Na Le Go Imelwa, Ke Merwalo Ya Rona?
Jeso Mmoloki, phemelo, Go Morena thapelong;
A o nyadiwa ke ditsala? Bolelela Morena;
Mme O tla go sireletsa, O tla gomola gone.
Jeso Oa Go Bitsa Ka Bonolo, Kwa Legayeng Gompieno,
O tlogelang seding ja lorato O ntse O ya kgakala?
O wa bitsa,...gompieno;...Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo
gompieno.
T. & B. Bitsa, bitsa gompieno; Bitsa, bitsa gompieno;
Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo, ka bonolo gompieno.
Jeso O Bitsa Ba Ba Lapileng, Go Ikhutsa Gompieno,
Mo leretse morwalo wa gago, Mme o tla segofala.
O wa bitsa,...gompieno;...Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo
gompieno.
T. & B. Bitsa, bitsa gompieno; Bitsa, bitsa gompieno;
Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo, ka bonolo gompieno.
Jeso O Letile Tla Go Ene, O Letile, Gompieno;
Tla le be tsa gago O obame, tla mme O se diege.
O wa bitsa,...gompieno;...Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo
gompieno.
T. & B. Bitsa, bitsa gompieno; Bitsa, bitsa gompieno;
Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo, ka bonolo gompieno.
Jeso Oa Rapela O Utlwe, Ntswe Ja Gagwe, Gompieno;
Ba ba Mo dumelang ba tla ipela, Nanoga O tsamae.
O wa bitsa,...gompieno;...Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo
gompieno.
T. & B. Bitsa, bitsa gompieno; Bitsa, bitsa gompieno;
Jeso Oa bitsa ka bonolo, ka bonolo gompieno.
Moeng O Teng Mojako, Mmulele;
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele);
O na A le teng pele, Mmulele;
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele);
Mmulele A ise A ye, Mmulele Moitshepi,
Jeso Morwa Modimo, Mmulele
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele).
Mmulele Pelo Ya Go A Tsene; Mmulele;
(Bulela Mmoloki O mmulele);
Fa O leta Oa feta, Mmulele;
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele);
Mmulele ke tsal’a go, O tla go sireletsa,
Go ya ka bosakhutleng, Mmulele,
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele).
A Janong Wa Mo Utlwa? Mmulele:
(Bulela Mmoloki O mmulele);
Janong Mo itlhaolele, Mmulele;
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele);
O eme fa mojako, O tla go fa boipelo,
O tlotle ina ja Gwe, Mmulele,
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele).
Moeng Wa Legodimo, Mmulele
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele);
O tla nna mo modirong, Mmulele;
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele);
O tla go itshwarela, Fa tsa lefatshe di ile,
O tla go isa gae, Mmulele,
(Bulela Mmoloki, O mmulele).
Mmusi O Tsile Go Jeso ’Sigo,
Go Mmotsa ka tsela ya polokego;
Moruti a araba ka thanolo.
"Lona tsalwang gape."
"Lona tsalwang gape,
Lona tsalwang gape,
Ammaruri, amaaruri, Ke go ra’a,
Lona tsalwang gape."
Bana Ba Batho Reetsang Foko
Je le builweng ke Jeso Morena,
Lo se le dire thomo ya lefela
"Lona tsalwang gape."
"Lona tsalwang gape,
Lona tsalwang gape,
Ammaruri, amaaruri, Ke go ra’a,
Lona tsalwang gape."
Lona Ba Lo Ka Tsenang Boikhutsong,
Lwa opela gone le babolokwa,
Fa lo tla bona’ tshelo bo sa khutleng,
"Lona tsalwang gape."
"Lona tsalwang gape,
Lona tsalwang gape,
Ammaruri, amaaruri, Ke go ra’a,
Lona tsalwang gape."
O Nkutlwe Selelo Ntshegofatse,
Tla Mogolodi, tla;
Ke obame mme kea Go eletsa,
Tla Mogolodi tla.
Ke timetse kgakala kwa majeng,
Ke ntse kgakala le legae,
O ntsee janong O ntlise lesakeng,
Tla Mogolodi tla.
Ga Ke Na Botshabelo Bosigong,
Tla Mogolodi, tla;
Tebo ya ’Go e ka mpha botshelo,
Tla Mogolodi, tla.
Ke timetse kgakala kwa majeng,
Ke ntse kgakala le legae,
O ntsee janong O ntlise lesakeng,
Tla Mogolodi tla.
Tseleng Ke Nosi Mme Ke Lapile,
Tla Mogolodi, tla;
Matlho a me a leba go Wena,
Tla Mogolodi, tla.
Ke timetse kgakala kwa majeng,
Ke ntse kgakala le legae,
O ntsee janong O ntlise lesakeng,
Tla Mogolodi tla.
Ga O Ketla O Nyatsa Phegelo,
Tla Mogolodi, tla;
Ntheetsa thapelong, nkutlwa telong,
Tla Mogolodi, tla.
Ke timetse kgakala kwa majeng,
Ke ntse kgakala le legae,
O ntsee janong O ntlise lesakeng,
Tla Mogolodi tla.
Yo O Ka Gololang; Bolelang Gotlhe;
O golola mang le mang yoo utlwang;
Bokepisong moleofi yo timetseng,
Jeso O tla golola yo o tla tlang.
Yo O ka gololang; Boloka janong,
Fa O ka dumela Mokaulengwe.
Yo O Ka Gololang; Ruri Ke Jalo?
A go na le thata e ka nkgololang?
A ruri Keresete yo tlhabilweng
O ka nkgolola kgoleng ya Satane?
Yo O ka gololang; Boloka janong,
Fa O ka dumela Mokaulengwe.
Yo O Ka Gololang; Nametso Mmoifi;
O direla Jeso? Boloka ba ’Gwe
Se boife Satane, O tshware Jeso,
O se belaele O eme fela.
Yo O ka gololang; Boloka janong,
Fa O ka dumela Mokaulengwe.

title: Re Tla Aga Mo Go Jeso

lines: Re Tla Aga Mo Go Jeso Mo
Lefikeng ja bosakhutleng;
Jalo mogang matsubutsubu
A tsogang re tla ema.
Tla aga Fikeng, tla aga Fikeng;
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota, Kresete Lefika.
A.T.&B.
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota,
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng, tota,
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota, Kresete Lefika.
Bangwe Ba Aga Mo Mosaweng
Wa dikhumo tsa lefatshe;
Bangwe makhubung a boleo,
A tlotlo le kgatlhego.
Tla aga Fikeng, tla aga Fikeng;
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota, Kresete Lefika.
A.T.&B.
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota,
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng, tota,
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota, Kresete Lefika.
A Lo Ko Lo Age Mo Fikeng,
Motheong o o tlhomameng;
Tsholofelo ya poloko ya
Rona ke e tlhomameng.
Tla aga Fikeng, tla aga Fikeng;
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota, Kresete Lefika.
A.T.&B.
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota,
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng, tota,
Re tla aga mo Lefikeng tota, Kresete Lefika.
Mpolelelang Kaga Jeso, Kwalang Mo Pelong Ya Me,
Lo mpolelele mafoko A Monate g’utluwa.
Mpolelelang ka ba’ngele, B’opelela go tsalwa,
Kgalalelo go Modimo, kagiso mo lefatshing.
Mpolelelang kaga Jeso Kwalang mo pelong ya me.
Lo mpolelele mafoko A monate g’utluwa.
A Ila Dijo Mo Nageng, Bolela Malatsi Ao,
A raelelwa be tsa rona, Mme A fenya bofelong.
Bolela ngwaga tsa tiro, Bolela bofutsana,
A nyadiwa a bogis’wa, A sena gae A ganwa.
Mpolelelang kaga Jeso Kwalang mo pelong ya me.
Lo mpolelele mafoko A monate g’utluwa.
Bolela Mokgoro Wa Gwe, Botlhokung Le Ditlhabing,
Bolela ka phupu ya Gwe; Kafa O tshelang gape,
Lorato lo lo bonolo, Ke lo bona sentle-ntle;
Mma ke lele fa O seba, Lorato lo ntueletse.
Mpolelelang kaga Jeso Kwalang mo pelong ya me.
Lo mpolelele mafoko A monate g’utluwa.

title: Jeso Modisa Yo Lorato Wa Go Bitsa

lines: Jeso, Modisa Yo Lorato Wa Go Bitsa
Go tsena polokegong Mo go boikhutso;
Tla nonofong ya bonna, Tla mosong wa bokau,
Tsena mo polokegong, Tseleng boammaaruri.
Loratong ka bonolo Oa bitsa;
Tla motimedi, tla kwano go Nna,
Ke mmona A eme ka boitshoko,
Jeso Modisa wa me.
Jeso Modisa Yo O’rato O Go Swetse,
Mme janong wa go bitsa, Motimedi tla go Nna;
Akofa go diphatsa, Go bitsa Modisa,
Tsena mo polokegong, Tsena boikhutsong.
Loratong ka bonolo Oa bitsa;
Tla motimedi, tla kwano go Nna,
Ke mmona A eme ka boitshoko,
Jeso Modisa wa me.
Tiego Ke Bomatla, Diphiri Di Tletse,
Di batla letimela, Go bol’a dikwana;
Jeso Modisa yo O Rato Oa go bitsa,
Go tsena polokegong Mo go leng boikhutso.
Loratong ka bonolo Oa bitsa;
Tla motimedi, tla kwano go Nna,
Ke mmona A eme ka boitshoko,
Jeso Modisa wa me.
Mogang Moatlhodi A Re Lekanyetsang Bokhutlo,
A re tla nna jaaka gouda? Kgotsa jaaka mabebe
O lekantswe ke Morena, Mme O tlhaetse;
O lekantswe ka foko ja Gwe, O tlhaetse.
A Re Tla Utlwela Go Twe "Motlhanka Yo Molemo
O dirile sentle," kgotsa "O tlhaetse," Moleofi?
O lekantswe ke Morena, Mme O tlhaetse;
O lekantswe ka foko ja Gwe, O tlhaetse.
A Re Tla Akela Moya, Go Sa Le Tshegofatso,
Kgotsa re tla diega go Bo go kanelwe tshenyo?
O lekantswe ke Morena, Mme O tlhaetse;
O lekantswe ka foko ja Gwe, O tlhaetse.
Utlwa Mafoko A Mmoloki,
A botshelo, le tlhomamo,
Wena yo’ sa rapeleng utlwa Jeso,
O re, "Go sego ba ba dirang."
Go sego ba ba dirang ditaolo,
Go sego bone, ba sego;
Go sego ba ba dirang ditaolo,
Go sego, go sego bone;
R’utlwa Ka Boithamako Taolo,
Le tsholofetso tsa Gagwe;
Go d’utlwa le poifo, ga go boloke,
Go sego bone ba ba dirang.
Go sego ba ba dirang ditaolo,
Go sego bone, ba sego;
Go sego ba ba dirang ditaolo,
Go sego, go sego bone;
Ba Ka Tsena Ka Boitumelo,
Ba golotswe sebing, dintweng,
Ba itshepisitswe, ka bosakhutleng,
Ba ka ja tlhare sa botshelo.
Go sego ba ba dirang ditaolo,
Go sego bone, ba sego;
Go sego ba ba dirang ditaolo,
Go sego, go sego bone;

title: Ga Go Tsala E Tshwanang Le Jeso

lines: Ga Go Tsala E Tshwanang Le Jeso,
Nnyaa ga e’o nnyaa ga e’o;
Ga go yo’ka re alafang moyeng,
Nnyaa ga e’o nnyaa ga e’o;
Jeso O re itse tlalelong,
O tla goga tsatsing jotlhe,
Ga go tsala e tshwanang le Jeso,
Nnyaa ga’ e’o ; nnyaa ga e’o.
Ga Go Tsala E E Boitshepo,
Nnyaa ga e’o; nnyaa ga e’o;
Gape ga go tsal’e pelonomi,
Nnyaa ga e’o; nnyaa ga e’o
Jeso O re itse tlalelong,
O tla goga tsatsing jotlhe,
Ga go tsala e tshwanang le Jeso,
Nnyaa ga’ e’o ; nnyaa ga e’o.
Ga Go Nako E A Seng Go Rona,
Nnyaa ga e’o; nnyaa ga e’o.
Ga go sigo jo A sa gomotseng,
Nnyaa bope; nnyaa bope.
Jeso O re itse tlalelong,
O tla goga tsatsing jotlhe,
Ga go tsala e tshwanang le Jeso,
Nnyaa ga’ e’o ; nnyaa ga e’o.
A O Kile A Latlha Moitshepi?
Ga g’ope; ga g’ope;
Kana a O ganne moleofi?
Nnyaa ope; nnaya ope.
Jeso O re itse tlalelong,
O tla goga tsatsing jotlhe,
Ga go tsala e tshwanang le Jeso,
Nnyaa ga’ e’o ; nnyaa ga e’o.
A Mpho E Teng E Jaaka Mmoloki?
Nnyaa ga e’o; nnyaa ga e’o;
A o tla re gana legodimong?
Nnyaa gope; nnyaa gope.
Jeso O re itse tlalelong,
O tla goga tsatsing jotlhe,
Ga go tsala e tshwanang le Jeso,
Nnyaa ga’ e’o ; nnyaa ga e’o.
Go Botshelo Tebong Mo Mokgorong,
Jeso’ rile "Leba go Nna;"
Khumo ya lefatshe ke bontsho,
Ke bona khum’e ntle mo mokgorong.
Mo tebong go botshelo, Mo tebong Golegotha;
Poloko, kgololego, Mo tebong Golegotha.
Erile Fa Ke Leba Mmoloki,
A nyenya ka boitumelo,
Fa ke tlelwa ke dithaelo,
Ke bona nonofo mo mokgorong.
Mo tebong go botshelo, Mo tebong Golegotha;
Poloko, kgololego, Mo tebong Golegotha.
Ke Tla Leba Mokgoro Ka Metlha,
Ke ikanya tsholofetso;
Ga go yo welang mo thaelong
Yo’ ikanyang nonofo ya Godimo.
Mo tebong go botshelo, Mo tebong Golegotha;
Poloko, kgololego, Mo tebong Golegotha.

title: Ka Bonolo Jeso O Ntse A Bitsa

lines: Ka Bonolo Jeso O Ntse A Bitsa,
O bitsa wena le nna;
O letile mo Mojakong wa pelo,
Letile wena le nna.
Tlang gae, tlang gae,
Ba lo lapileng tlang gae;
Ka bonolo Jeso O ntse A bitsa,
O bitsa, tla molefi.
Re Ka Nnelang Fa Jeso A Rapela,
A rapelela rona;
Re ka diegelang g’utlwa tshegofatso,
Tshegofatso ya rona.
Tlang gae, tlang gae,
Ba lo lapileng tlang gae;
Ka bonolo Jeso O ntse A bitsa,
O bitsa, tla molefi.
Nako E Akofile E Ya Feta,
E feta wena le nna;
Meruti e tla le sigo jwa loso,
Di tlela wena le nna.
Tlang gae, tlang gae,
Ba lo lapileng tlang gae;
Ka bonolo Jeso O ntse A bitsa,
O bitsa, tla molefi.
Gopola Ka Rato Lwa Tsholofetso,
Tsholofetso go rona;
Lefa re leofile O boitshwarelo,
Boitshwarelo go rona.
Tlang gae, tlang gae,
Ba lo lapileng tlang gae;
Ka bonolo Jeso O ntse A bitsa,
O bitsa, tla molefi.
Tswalo Se Teng Se Aegilweng,
Marang a tswang ka sone,
A tswa mokgorong kgakala, Loratong lwa Mmoloki.
A boutlwelo botlhoko; Le nna ke buletswe kgoro?
Le nna, le nna? A e buletswe le nna?
Tswalo Se Buletswe Botlhe, Ba Ba Batlang Poloko;
Bahumi, Bahumanegi, Ba ditso le merafe.
A boutlwelo botlhoko; Le nna ke buletswe kgoro?
Le nna, le nna? A e buletswe le nna?
Tswelelang Gare Ga Baba; Fa Tswalo Se Sa Butswe,
Ka mokgoro tsa’ng serwalo, Sesupo sa lorato.
A boutlwelo botlhoko; Le nna ke buletswe kgoro?
Le nna, le nna? A e buletswe le nna?
Moseja Ole Wa Noka Re Tla Rola Mokgoro,
Re tsee rwalo sa botshelo, Re Mo rate godimong.
A boutlwelo botlhoko; Le nna ke buletswe kgoro?
Le nna, le nna? A e buletswe le nna?
Ngaka E Kgolo E Gaufi, Jes’ O Pelotlhomogi
O bua ka go nametsa, Utlwa lentswe ja Jeso.
O opelwa godimong, O ratwa le ke batho,
Monate go opelwa, Jeso yo o sego.
Dibeng O Go Itshwaretse, Utlwa Lentswe Ja Jeso;
Ya godimong ka kagiso. Rwala rwalo sa Jeso.
O opelwa godimong, O ratwa le ke batho,
Monate go opelwa, Jeso yo o sego.
Tlotlo Go Kwana E E Swang, Ke Dumela Go Jeso;
Ke rat’ina ja mmoloki, Ke rat’ina ja Jeso.
O opelwa godimong, O ratwa le ke batho,
Monate go opelwa, Jeso yo o sego.
Le Tlosa Molato Wa Me Leina La Ga Jeso;
Ke itumela go utlwa Leina la ga Jeso.
O opelwa godimong, O ratwa le ke batho,
Monate go opelwa, Jeso yo o sego.
Mogang A Tlang Le Serwalo, Serwalo Sa Botshelo;
Foo re tla nna fatshe nae, Re bua ka thekololo.
O opelwa godimong, O ratwa le ke batho,
Monate go opelwa, Jeso yo o sego.
Pelo Ya ’Go E Tletse, A Jeso G’a Na Bonno
O tshwerwe ke lefatshe A Jeso g’a na bonno?
O eme mo mojakong, Mme O ya kgwanyakgwanya;
Mo utlwe wa rapela A Jeso g’a na bonno?
O Ntse O Senya Nako, Ga O Direle Jeso?
O senya thata ya ’Gwe Ga O direle Jeso?
G’o lwele phenyo sebing, Ga O gape yo mongwe,
G’o tsenye motimedi, Ga O direle Jeso.
O Batla Tsa Lefatshe, G’o Na Nako Ya Jeso?
Ya tiro e molemo, G’o na nako ya Jeso?
Boitumelo le khumo Tsa lefatshe jeno, ke
Tsone tse O di batlang, Ga O nako ka Jeso?
O Makakaba Fela, G’o Na Ungo Lwa Jeso?
Ga O a tshola sepe, G’o na ungo lwa Jeso?
Ga O boloke sepe, Go duela tiro ya go
Ga go boipelo mogang O rakanang le Jeso.
Ke Utlwa Ntswe Ja ’Go, Le Mpitsa Morena;
Go ntlafatswa mading a ’Go, A elang khal’fari
K’e tla Morena, Ke tla go Wena;
O ntlhapise mo mading, A elang Khal’fari.
Ke Tla Mo Bokoeng, Thata E Go Wena;
O nntlafatsa lesweng jotlhe, Ke be ke itsheke.
K’e tla Morena, Ke tla go Wena;
O ntlhapise mo mading, A elang Khal’fari.
Ke Jeso’ Mpiletsang Tumelong, Loratong;
Tsholofelong le kagisong,’Fatshing le godimong.
K’e tla Morena, Ke tla go Wena;
O ntlhapise mo mading, A elang Khal’fari.
Tumisang Madi A ’Gwe; Tumisang Poloko;
Tumisang neo ya Morena, Nonofo ya rona.
K’e tla Morena, Ke tla go Wena;
O ntlhapise mo mading, A elang Khal’fari.
Ke Utlwa Mmoloki A Re, "Ga O Thata;
Itisa rapela, Bona tsotlhe go Nna."
Jeso O duetse, Nna ke molato;
’Be ne se nngaparetse; O tlhatswitse sotlhe.
Morena, Ke Bona Nonofo Ya Gago,
Ka tlhatswa lepero, Ya ntlafatsa pelo.
Jeso O duetse, Nna ke molato;
’Be ne se nngaparetse; O tlhatswitse sotlhe.
Ka Ke Sa Tshwanela, Tshegofatsong Ya Go,
Ke tla tlhatswa kobo Mading a khal’fari.
Jeso O duetse, Nna ke molato;
’Be ne se nngaparetse; O tlhatswitse sotlhe.
Fa K’ema Teroneng, Ke Itekanetse,
Ke tla rola morwalo, Otlhe naong tsa ga Jeso.
Jeso O duetse, Nna ke molato;
’Be ne se nngaparetse; O tlhatswitse sotlhe.
E, Janong Ke Bona Madi, Motswedi O Boteng;
Jeso Moren’ O bolokang, O supa tlhakoring.
Ke bona Motswedi O tlhatswang,
Janong ke tsena go tlhapa;
Bakang Morena wa ntlhatswa,
O wa ntlhatswa, e wa ntlhatswa.
Ke Bona Bopo Lo Losa, K’utlwa Madia Buang;
A re tshenyego e ya swa, Mading a tlhapisang.
Ke bona Motswedi O tlhatswang,
Janong ke tsena go tlhapa;
Bakang Morena wa ntlhatswa,
O wa ntlhatswa, e wa ntlhatswa.
Ke Tlhatlogela Leseding, Je Le Kwa Godimo;
Ka pelo e itshekileng, Jeso A le mo teng.
Ke bona Motswedi O tlhatswang,
Janong ke tsena go tlhapa;
Bakang Morena wa ntlhatswa,
O wa ntlhatswa, e wa ntlhatswa.
Kgakgamatso Fano Tlase, G’utlwa Madi A Duleng,
Mme ke itse Jeso fela, Wa me yo’ bapotsweng.
Ke bona Motswedi O tlhatswang,
Janong ke tsena go tlhapa;
Bakang Morena wa ntlhatswa,
O wa ntlhatswa, e wa ntlhatswa.
Rara Ke Leba Go Wena; Ga K’itse Nngwe Thuso;
Fa Wena O nteseletsa, Ao ke tla ya kwa kae?
Janong ke na le tumelo, Gore Jeso’ ntshwetse,
A tsholola madi a Gwe Go nkgolola sebing.
Ke Dumela Morwa Gago, O Nltutiwise Thata:
Mme O nkgolole dithatong Gone nakong eno.
Janong ke na le tumelo, Gore Jeso’ ntshwetse,
A tsholola madi a Gwe Go nkgolola sebing.
Mung-a Tumelo Go Wena, Ke Leba K’eletsa;
Janong ke bone mpho eo, Fa e se yo nka swa.
Janong ke na le tumelo, Gore Jeso’ ntshwetse,
A tsholola madi a Gwe Go nkgolola sebing.

title: Ke Opela Rato Lwa Ga Jeso

lines: Ke Opela Rato Lwa Ga Jeso Yo O Nthatang
O dule magodimong A swa khalefari.
Ke opela rato lwa Ga Jeso, ke tla mmaka;
O ntshwetse ke tla tshela; Ke tla opela rato.
Pele K’ise Ke Lele, Jeso O La Ntelela;
Ke ise ke rapele, O la A nthapelela
Ke opela rato lwa Ga Jeso, ke tla mmaka;
O ntshwetse ke tla tshela; Ke tla opela rato.
A Boteng Jwa Lorato; Lefatshe Ga Le Itse
Gore be tse jaaka tsa Me di ka nna tshweu.
Ke opela rato lwa Ga Jeso, ke tla mmaka;
O ntshwetse ke tla tshela; Ke tla opela rato.
Ga Ke Na Se Molemo; O Na A Ka Nthata Jang?
Morena O nkgapile, Nthusa go Go rata.
Ke opela rato lwa Ga Jeso, ke tla mmaka;
O ntshwetse ke tla tshela; Ke tla opela rato.
Gaufi Le Pelo Ya Gago,
Ntlisa Mmoloki yo O tlhokegang;
O nkatametse mo sefubeng,
O ntshireletse mo boikhutsong.
O ntshireletse mo boikhutsong.
Gaufi Ga Ke Lere Sepe,
Ga go tshupelo ya Jeso Kgosi;
Ke pelo e e ngomogileng,
O ntlhapise mo madinga Gago,
O ntlhapise mo mading a Gago.
Gaufi Le Morena Wa Me,
Ke latlha boleo, bomatla, le
Boipelo, boikgodiso;
O mphe Morena yo o bapotsweng,
O mphe Morena yo o bapotsweng.
Gaufi Fa Ke Sa Tshedile;
Ke be ke tlhomame kgalalelong;
Ka dingwaga tse di sa khutleng,
Ke nne gaufi nao Mmoloki,
Ke nne gaufi nao Mmoloki.
Leina Je Lentle Gotlhe Monate Pelong Ya Me,
Le ne la newa ke Rara, Morwawe yo o ratwang.
Ke leina je le Boitshepo le dule
Kwa go Rara ja tla mo lefatshing.
Le lerwe ke baengele mo bosigong,
Ke leina jaga Jeso.
Mo Pelong Le Lere Sego, Mme Ke Tla Tsaya Pako,
K’ipolela ina ja Gwe, Ke le bolela gape.
Ke leina je le Boitshepo le dule
Kwa go Rara ja tla mo lefatshing.
Le lerwe ke baengele mo bosigong,
Ke leina jaga Jeso.
Ekete Ke Ka Opela, Thekololo Ya Gagwe,
Dipako tsa bosakhutleng, Leineng je le golo.
Ke leina je le Boitshepo le dule
Kwa go Rara ja tla mo lefatshing.
Le lerwe ke baengele mo bosigong,
Ke leina jaga Jeso.
E Seng Nna, Kreste A Ratwe A Tlotlwe;
A gole a bonwe A itsiwe;
E seng nna, ke Kreste, tebong le tirong,
Kreste kakanyong, le lefokung.
E Seng Nna, Ke Kreste Yo O Gomotsang,
Ke le bofutsaneng le selelong.
Kreste go tsholetsa morwalo o o
Bokete, go didimatsa poifo.
Kreste Fela E Seng Boithamako,
Kreste fela e seng ditshameko;
Kreste fela e seng go ikgodisa,
Kreste fela go se fitlhelwe nna.
E Seng Nna Ke Kreste O Nayang Tsotlhe,
Kreste nonofo le tshelo jwa me;
Kreste fela mmeleng, botshelong, moyeng,
Kreste fela le ka bosakhutleng.
Go Letsatsi Kwa Dithabeng, Go Letsatsi Lewatleng,
Mme marang a gouda a Robetse kwa botaleng;
Mme lesedi je legolo, Le tlatsa pelo ya me,
Gonne O nna teng Mmoloki, Go lesedi kwa O teng.
Ao a lesedi je le lentle; Ke letsatsi mo pelong.
Jeso O tlosa maswabi; Ke letsatsi mo pelong.
Leroding Ke Sia Maswabi A Malatsi A Fetang,
Gonne O nthwesa boipelo Mme O ntlatsa ka pako;
Mme gaeng ja kgalaleo, Jele O le nkgapetseng,
Ke tlhatlogela ka pelo, Mo’a me o Go latetse.
Ao a lesedi je le lentle; Ke letsatsi mo pelong.
Jeso O tlosa maswabi; Ke letsatsi mo pelong.
O Intheketse Mmoloki, Gotlhe Ga Me Ga Gago;
Lobone lwa rato lwa ’Go Lo tuke go Go baka;
Mme gaeng ja kgakalelo, Jele O le nkgapetseng,
Ke tlhatlogela ka pelo, Mo’a me o Go latela.
Ao a lesedi je le lentle; Ke letsatsi mo pelong.
Jeso O tlosa maswabi; Ke letsatsi mo pelong.

title: Ke Na Le Kopelo K’e Ratang

lines: Ke Na Le Kopelo K’e Ratang, Ka Ke Rekolotswe;
Ya Mmoloki wa me Kgosi, Ka ke rekolotswe.
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ka ke rekolotswe Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ke ipelafatsa Mmoloking.
Ke Na Le Krest’ O Ntekaneng, Ka Ke Rekolotswe;
Thato ya ’Gwe ke e dire, Ka ke rekolotswe
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ka ke rekolotswe Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ke ipelafatsa Mmoloking.
Ke Na Le Mosupi Tota, Ka Ke Rekolotswe;
Yo O tlosang pelaelo, Ka ke rekolotswe.
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ka ke rekolotswe Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ke ipelafatsa Mmoloking.
Ke Baakanyeditswe Legae, Ka Ke Rekolotswe;
Ke tla nna ka bosakhutleng, Ka ke rekoloswe.
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ka ke rekolotswe Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Ka ke rekolotswe, Ke ipelafatsa Mmoloking.
Modimo O Bona Go Wa Thaga Wa E Tshola;
Fa a rata dinonyane, Kea itse Wa nthata.
O wa nthata, O Wa nthata, Kea itse Oa nthata;
Gonne O rata tse dinnye, Kea itse Wa nthata.
O Taka Dithunya Nageng, O Di Naya Lonko,
Mme fa A rata dithunya, Kea itse Wa nthata.
O wa nthata, O Wa nthata, Kea itse Oa nthata;
Gonne O rata tse dinnye, Kea itse Wa nthata.
Modimo O Di Dirile, Tsotlhe Le Tse Kgolo;
Ga A na go di lebala, Kea itse Wa nthata.
O wa nthata, O Wa nthata, Kea itse Oa nthata;
Gonne O rata tse dinnye, Kea itse Wa nthata.
Nako ’Ntle Ya Thapelo, Fa Re Ingotlile,
Re phuthegetse Jeso Mmoloki Tsala;
Fa re tla ka tumelo, Oa re sireletsa.
A kgomotso molaping; Go sego go nna teng,
Nako’a thapelo, Nako’a thapelo,
A kgomotso molaping; Go sego go nna teng.
Nako Ntle Ya Thapelo Mmoloki O Gone,
Ka bonolo go utlwa bana ba Gagwe,
Fa A re re latlhele merwalo naong tsa Gwe,
Ke kgomotso molaping. Go sego go nna teng.
Nako’a thapelo, Nako’a thapelo,
A kgomotso molaping; Go sego go nna teng.
Nako ’Ntle Ya Thapelo, Fa Ba Ba Raelwang,
Ba lere Mmoloking tlalelo tsa bone;
Ka kutlwelo-botlhoko, O di tlosa tsotlhe;
A kgomotso molaping. Go sego go nna teng
Nako’a thapelo, Nako’a thapelo,
A kgomotso molaping; Go sego go nna teng.
Nako ’Ntle Ya Thapelo, Re Ya Mo Dumela,
Gore kannete re tla bona masego,
Go Mo ikanyeng, re tla gololwa go tsotlhe;
A kgomotso molaping. Go sego go nna teng.
Nako’a thapelo, Nako’a thapelo,
A kgomotso molaping; Go sego go nna teng.
Jeso’ Rile Kwa Babedi Bararo,
Ba Go phuthegetseng, O tla dira teng
Janong r’a dumela, Re mo thapelong;
Jeso segofatsa; O itshenole.
Jeso segofatsa Fa re le fano;
Jeso segofatsa, O nne gaufi
Jeso O Ntse O Kopana Le Rona,
Tla O nne le rona Ka bosakhutleng;
Tla Wena Mmoloki, Bonatsa tswaro;
Utlwa, segofatsa Fa re rapela.
Jeso segofatsa Fa re le fano;
Jeso segofatsa, O nne gaufi
Jeso O Re Rute Pako Tsa Gago;
E re fa re lopa Wena re utlwa,
Re tiise tumelong, Le tsholofelong,
Re itsheke ’ratong Lesedi tseleng.
Jeso segofatsa Fa re le fano;
Jeso segofatsa, O nne gaufi
Ke Wa Go Jeso ’Ntswe Ja Go Le Mpolelela Rato Lwa Go;
Mme ke eletsa go tlhatlogela Go Wena ka tumelo.
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Le mokgoro wa Gago;
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Mading a ’Go a mantle.
Ntsenya Tirelong Ya ’Go Morena,
Ka thata e e boitshepo;
Ke lebe godimo tsholofelong, Ke dire thato ya ’Go.
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Le mokgoro wa Gago;
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Mading a ’Go a mantle.
A Lobaka Lwa Boitumelo Fa Teroneng Ya Gago,
Ke khubama, le Wena ke bua Jaaka tsala, le tsala.
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Le mokgoro wa Gago;
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Mading a ’Go a mantle.
Go Lorato Lo Lo Boteng Thata, Kwa Moseja Ga ’Watle;
Go maipelo a goletsegileng, Kwa kagisong ya Gago.
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Le mokgoro wa Gago;
Nkatametsa (gaufi) gaufi, Morena,
Mading a ’Go a mantle.
Nke Ke Tshwane Le Jeso, Mmoloki A Nne Le Nna;
Ntlatsa kagiso, rato; Ntira bopelonomi;
Nke ke tshwane le Jeso, Fa ke le mo lefatshing;
Ke humanege moyeng, Mmoloki A nne go nna.
F’a Utlwa Mahukubu; Fa Leitlho Ja Gagwe
Le bona dinonyane Ruri O tla nkutlwa nna,
O tla nthuta go tshela, Bomatleng A intshwarele,
Ke nne itsheke pelong, Mmoloki A nne go nna.
Nke Ke Tshwane Le Jeso, Ke Rapele Ka Metlha;
Ke ikhutse go Ene, Metsing a a didimetseng;
Ke tsetswe tshegofatsong, Ka lorato lwa Gagwe,
Ke humile tumelo, Mmoloki A nne go nna.
Jeso Ke Nne Mokgorong, Go Motswedi Gone,
O o fodisang bothle, O tswa Khalefari.
Mokgorong, mokgorong, Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Go tsam’a ke ikhutse Moseja ga noka.
Ke Roroma Mokgorong, Rato Lo Mphithletse;
Teng Naledi ya Moso E ne ya ntlhabela.
Mokgorong, mokgorong, Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Go tsam’a ke ikhutse Moseja ga noka.
Gone Mpontshe Mokgorong Kwana Ya Modimo.
O nthusa go tsamaya Ka metlha mokgorong.
Mokgorong, mokgorong, Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Go tsam’a ke ikhutse Moseja ga noka.
Mokgorong Ke Tla Leta, Tsholofeng Fela;
Ke tle ke fitlhe khumong Moseja ga noka.
Mokgorong, mokgorong, Ke tla ipelafatsa;
Go tsam’a ke ikhutse Moseja ga noka.
O Ntese Ke Tsamaye Nao, Modimo Jaaka Enoke;
O tshware seatla sa me, O bue ka bonolo le nna;
Lefa ke sa bone tsela, Jeso O tsamaye le nna.
Ga Ke Tsamae Ke Le Nosi; Sefefo Se Galefile;
Diru di ntshwara dinaong, Baba ba ntaletse gaufi;
O didimatse lewatle Morena tsamaya le nna.
Fa Ke Ikhutsa Go Wena, Tsa Lefatshe Ke Lefela,
Ke eta ka pelokgale, Ke tla tsholetsa mokgoro,
Ke be ke bone Sione, Mmoloki tsamaya le nna.
Boipelong Legodimong, Ke Tsholeletsa ’Ntswe Ja Me;
Mang yo o ka opelang pako Ya lorato lwa ga Jeso?
Rato lo lo gakgamatsang; Ke ’rato lwa ga Jeso;
Rato lo lo gakgamatsang; Ke ’rato lwa ga Jeso.
Ke Boipelo Le Kagiso, Tidimalo Le Lesedi,
Ke phodiso, le nonotsho, Lorato lo lo gakgamatsang.
Rato lo lo gakgamatsang; Ke ’rato lwa ga Jeso;
Rato lo lo gakgamatsang; Ke ’rato lwa ga Jeso.
Ke Boitshwarelo Jwa Me, Ke Thuso Ya Me Fa Ke Wa;
Tshelong, losong, tsa me tsotlhe, Ke rato lo lo
gakgamatsang.
Rato lo lo gakgamatsang; Ke ’rato lwa ga Jeso;
Rato lo lo gakgamatsang; Ke ’rato lwa ga Jeso.
Ke Ya Go Rata Morena, Go Gaisa Tsa ’Fatshe;
Gonne O mphile kagiso E e sa senyegeng.
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Ka rato lo ntletseng;
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Madi a a ntlhatswang.
O Gaufi Go Gaisa Botlhe Ba Lefatshe;
Monate kgopolong ya ’Go Go gaisa kopelo.
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Ka rato lo ntletseng;
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Madi a a ntlhatswang.
O Mphile Boitumelo Mme Ke Tla Ipela;
Kwa ntle ga rato lwa Gago Ke nna mo maswabing.
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Ka rato lo ntletseng;
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Madi a a ntlhatswang.
Mmoloki Yo Montle Wa Me; Go Tla Nna Jang K’o Teng?
Fa re ka rweswa boipelo Go Wena fatshing je.
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Ka rato lo ntletseng;
Ga go ya bolelwa gotlhe, Madi a a ntlhatswang.

title: Kwa A Ka Nkisang Ke Tla Ya

lines: Kwa A Ka Nkisang Ke Tla Ya, K’ithutile Go M’ikanya,
Ke gakologelwa gore, O ntlhabetswe Khalefari.
Jeso O tla nkgoga gotlhe, Jeso O tla nkgoga tseleng,
Ke tsala e boikanyo, Ke gakologelwa Loso.
K’itumela Taolong Ya ’Gwe, Ke Rata Ene A Nkgoga,
Monate go rata ga’Gwe, Go itshepisitswe Khal’fari.
Jeso O tla nkgoga gotlhe, Jeso O tla nkgoga tseleng,
Ke tsala e boikanyo, Ke gakologelwa Loso.
Ke Tsamaya Go Se Poifo, Boitumelong Go Mmoloki,
Tsholofelong ya go bona Jeso Tsal’a me Khal’fari.
Jeso O tla nkgoga gotlhe, Jeso O tla nkgoga tseleng,
Ke tsala e boikanyo, Ke gakologelwa Loso.
Tsa’a Lefatshe, Mme Nnee Jeso,
Tsa jone, boithamako;
Mme lorato lwa Gagwe ke
Lo lo se nang bokhutlo.
Bogolo jwa tshegofatso;
Ao bogolo jwa rato;
Botlalo jwa thekololo,
’Tshelo jo bo sa khutleng.
Tsa’a Lefatshe, Mme Nnee Jeso,
Kgomotso moyeng wa me;
Ke na le Mmoloki wa me
Ke tla opela gotlhe.
Bogolo jwa tshegofatso;
Ao bogolo jwa rato;
Botlalo jwa thekololo,
’Tshelo jo bo sa khutleng.
Tsa’a Lefatshe Mme Nnee Jeso,
Mma ke bone A nyenya,
Foo loetong lwa me lotlhe,
Sedi le tla ntlhabela.
Bogolo jwa tshegofatso;
Ao bogolo jwa rato;
Botlalo jwa thekololo,
’Tshelo jo bo sa khutleng.
Tsa’a Lefatshe, Mme Nnee Jeso,
Ke tla ikanya mokgoro,
Go tsamae mo phepafalong,
Ke bone Morena’me.
Bogolo jwa tshegofatso;
Ao bogolo jwa rato;
Botlalo jwa thekololo,
’Tshelo jo bo sa khutleng.
Tsa’a Tshelo Jwa Mme Bo Neelwe Wena Morena,
Tsa’a atla tsa me mme di Dire thato ya Gago.
Ntlhapisa mading a Mmoloki (a a mantle),
Ntlhapisa metsing a fodisang (a fodisang).
Morena ke Go na’a bojotlhe jwa me Go ya ka
bosakhutleng.
Tsa’a Dinao Tsa Me Mme Di Fefofele Wena;
Tsa’a ntswe ja me ka metlha Ke opelele Kgosi.
Ntlhapisa mading a Mmoloki (a a mantle),
Ntlhapisa metsing a fodisang (a fodisang).
Morena ke Go na’a bojotlhe jwa me Go ya ka
bosakhutleng.
Tsa’a Pounama Tsa Me Mme Di Tlatse Thomo Ya ’Go;
Tsa’a madi a me otlhe Go se je le saletseng.
Ntlhapisa mading a Mmoloki (a a mantle),
Ntlhapisa metsing a fodisang (a fodisang).
Morena ke Go na’a bojotlhe jwa me Go ya ka
bosakhutleng.
Tsa’a Nako Tsa Me Tsotlhe, Di Nnele Ruri Pakong,
Tsa’a kelelelo ya me O e dirise yotlhe.
Ntlhapisa mading a Mmoloki (a a mantle),
Ntlhapisa metsing a fodisang (a fodisang).
Morena ke Go na’a bojotlhe jwa me Go ya ka
bosakhutleng.
Itseele Thato Ya Me Mme Ga E Sa Le Ya Me;
Itseele pelo ya me E nne ’tulo sa Gago.
Ntlhapisa mading a Mmoloki (a a mantle),
Ntlhapisa metsing a fodisang (a fodisang).
Morena ke Go na’a bojotlhe jwa me Go ya ka
bosakhutleng.
Tsa’a Rato Lwa Me Jeso, Ke Lo Ba’a Naong Tsa ’Go;
O ntsee mme ke tla nna Wa Gago metlheng yotlhe.
Ntlhapisa mading a Mmoloki (a a mantle),
Ntlhapisa metsing a fodisang (a fodisang).
Morena ke Go na’a bojotlhe jwa me Go ya ka
bosakhutleng.
Ke Bonye Tsala Ya Nnete; O Ntse O Nthata Gale;
O nkgogetse mo go Ene, Ka kgole tsa lorato.
Mme mo pelong O mphapile Ka kgole e’sa kgaogeng,
Ke Oa Gagwe Ene wa me Ka gale le ka gale.
Ke Bonye Tsala Ya Nnete; Ene O Na A Ntshwela;
Ga se neo ya botshelo Fela O inneetse.
Ga kena se e leng sa me, Ke di tshwaretse Momphi;
Pelo, thata, le botshelo, Ke tsa Gagwe, ka gale.
Ke Bonye Tsala Ya Nnete; O Neilwe Thata Yotlhe;
Go nkgoga mo tseleng ya me, E e nkisang godimo.
Kgalalelo e sa khutlheng, Ke yone e ’nnotshang;
Go leta, go dira, go lwa, foo, boikhutso ka gale.
Ke Bonye Tsala Ya Nnete; Ke E E Pelonomi
Mogakolodi, Mogogi, Mohemedi yo’thata.
Go Yo o sa leng ka’nthata, Ga go se se ka ntlosang,
Botshelo, loso, kgotsa eng? Nyaa ke wa Gagwe gale.
K’utlwa Ntswe Ja Jeso Le Re "Tla Go Nna Ikhutse;
Ikaega wena molapi Mo sefubeng sa me."
Ka tla jaaka ke ne ke ntse Ke lapile thata;
Ka fitlhela boikhutso, O ’ntumedisitse.
Ke Utlwile Jeso A Re, "Bona, Ke Na’a Fela
Ga metse a a tshedileng; Inama, nwa , tshela."
Ka tla kwa go Jeso ka nwa Metse a tshedisang;
Ka timoga, ka safala, janong, ke tshedile.
Ke Utlwile Jeso A Re " Ke Sedi Ja’ Fatshe.
Leba go Nna O tlhabelwe Tsatsi ja phatsimo."
Ka leba Jeso, mme Ene Ke letsatsi ja me;
Ke tla tsama’a seding je ke Be ke fetse loeto.
Ke Ka Nna Wa Gago Mmoloki; O Nthute, O Nthute;
Nka dira thato’a ’Go Morena, O thuse janong.
Wa Gago (Jeso), Wa Gago (Jeso) E ke ikano ya me.
Wa Gago (Jeso), Wa Gago (Jeso) Morena gone janong.
A Tsa Lefatshe Tsotlhe Ke Eng O Se Teng, O Se Teng?
Ke tla di tlogelela Wena, O khumo ya me.
Wa Gago (Jeso), Wa Gago (Jeso) E ke ikano ya me.
Wa Gago (Jeso), Wa Gago (Jeso) Morena gone janong.
Fa Ke Fulara Tsa Lefatshe, Tla Gaufi, Tla Gaufi;
Go Wena ke fitlhela tsotlhe, Kgomotso ya me.
Wa Gago (Jeso), Wa Gago (Jeso) E ke ikano ya me.
Wa Gago (Jeso), Wa Gago (Jeso) Morena gone janong.
Monate Jang Mo Tsatsing Je, Je Le Itshepileng,
Fa re latlha tsa lefatshe, Re leba Modimong.
A Mafoko A Kagiso A A Tswang Go Yo O
Tsosang yo o ikwatlhayang, Go ya legodimong.
Mme Fa Go Itlosa Dibe, Go Re Retelela,
Ene yo o bonang pelong, O romela tshwaro.
Re Phatlalatse Morena, O Re Tlatse Kagiso;
Re rekololwe ka tshwaro, Re le ratong lwa Gago.
Re eta gar’a dikaka, Ao ko O re safatse.
Re Go Naya Malebogong Ka Ntlha Ya Foko Ja’go,
A maungo a poloko A nne pelong tsa rona.
Ka metlha re ikanyege Boammaaruring jwa’Go.
Fa Re Sa Ntse Re Tshedile, R’ineele Morena;
Re siane re sa lape, Re le mo tsholofelong,
Re e bone kgalalelo Ya Gago legodimong.
Ke Mo Tseleng Ya Godimo, Ka Metlha Ke Ya Tlhatloga;
Ke rapela ke ya gone, "Morena ntlhoma godimo."
Morena ntsholetsa ke eme, Ka tumelo legodimong,
Godimo go gaisa fano, Morena ntlhoma godimo.
Ga Ke Na Keletso Go Nna Ngongoregong Le Poifong,
Lefa bangwe ba go rata, Ke rapelela godimo.
Morena ntsholetsa ke eme, Ka tumelo legodimong,
Godimo go gaisa fano, Morena ntlhoma godimo.
Ke Senka Go Nna ’Godimong, Lefa Satane A Mphula;
Ka tumelo ke utlwile, Kopelo ya baitshepi.
Morena ntsholetsa ke eme, Ka tumelo legodimong,
Godimo go gaisa fano, Morena ntlhoma godimo.
Ke Senka Go Ya ’Godimong, Ke Bone Teng Kgalalelo;
Ke rapelela ’godimo, Morena nkisa ’godimong.
Morena ntsholetsa ke eme, Ka tumelo legodimong,
Godimo go gaisa fano, Morena ntlhoma godimo.
Se Kope Seipato, Go Tiro E Kgolo;
Leta go diris’wa Kwa Modimo O’isang.
Taletso ya Gwagwe O ntse O e newa;
Amogela, mme go Molemo go dira.
Tla, ao, tla (janong); Se kope seipato;
Tla, ao, tla (janong); Leta go diris’wa.
Se kope seipato, Karabo e ka re:
’Sentse rato lwa Me, Ga O ye ’godimong.
Se Kope Seipato, Morena Oa Bitsa,
Ka O ntse O gana, O Mo utlwe janong.
Masimo masweu, Badiri b’otlana,
O itumelele Tiro ya Morena.
Tla, ao, tla (janong); Se kope seipato;
Tla, ao, tla (janong); Leta go diris’wa.
Se kope seipato, Karabo e ka re:
’Sentse rato lwa Me, Ga O ye ’godimong.
Se Kope Seipato, Go Diphatsa Tiego;
Rato lo nyaditsweng, Lo tla ela ruri.
Fa tshwaro e bitsa, Mme e supa tsela,
Fa Jes’ A rapela, Tla O itshwarelwe.
Tla, ao, tla (janong); Se kope seipato;
Tla, ao, tla (janong); Leta go diris’wa.
Se kope seipato, Karabo e ka re:
’Sentse rato lwa Me, Ga O ye ’godimong.

title: O Tshele Mo Teng Ga Me

lines: O Tshele Mo Teng Ga Me, Kgosi Ya Dikgosi,
Wena O nne karabo Potsong tsotlhe tsa me;
O tshele mo teng ga me, Dira thato ya Go.
Mme nna ke bonafatse Kgalalelo ya Go.
Mmele O O Tshwaetswe, O Itshekisitswe;
A lesedi ja Gago, Le phatsime mo teng,
Fatshe le didimale, Mmele go tswa janong
Motlhanka wa Gago yo, O mo tsamaise.
Tokololo Tsa One Di Lete Go Bid’wa,
Gore O di dirise, Kgotsa di se dire;
Di nne di sa tlhoafatswa Ke tiro le teko,
Ditirelong tsa Gago, Kgotsa pelaelo.
Mme Ke Nne Tidimalong Ya Go Siamisiwa,
Ke ntse ke Go letile Fa Wena O ntlhoka,
O tshele mo teng ga me, Kgosi ya dikgosi,
Wena O nne karabo Potsong tsotlhe tsa me.
Nkgogela Gaufi Nao Rara, Ke Ya Go Eletsa;
Gaufi ntsenya mabogong a ’Go, Ke senka boikhutso.
Gaufi ka lorato, Nkgogela kwa go Wena,
Nkgogela kwa Go Wena gaufi.
-T. & B. Gaufi ka kgole tsa lorato,
Nkgoga, nkgogela kwa godimo.
Gaufi ka lorato, Nkgogela kwa godimo;
Gaufi nkgogela g’Wena.
Nkgogela Gaufi Nao Mmoloki, Ke Se Go Tlogele;
Fa ke le mabogong a Gago, Key a itebala.
Gaufi ka lorato, Nkgogela kwa go Wena,
Nkgogela kwa Go Wena gaufi.
-T. & B. Gaufi ka kgole tsa lorato,
Nkgoga, nkgogela kwa godimo.
Gaufi ka lorato, Nkgogela kwa godimo;
Gaufi nkgogela g’Wena.

title: Fa Ke Na Le Jeso Nka Ya Kae Le Kae

lines: Fa Ke Na Le Jeso Nka Ya Kae Le Kae,

title: Morena Ga Ke Rapelele Ka Moso

lines: Morena Ga Ke Rapelele Ka Moso;
Nthiba selabeng sa sebe Gompieno;
A ke se bue ’foko ja Ithamako;
Kana pounama tsa me Gompieno.
Nka Dira Ka Tlhoafalo, Ka Rapela;
Ke nne pelonomi tirong Gompieno
Nnonotsha k’utlwe go dira Thato ya Go;
Ke intshe setlhabelo Gompieno.
Mme Lefa Botshelo Jwa Me Bo Ka Feta,
Ao tsholofetso tsa Gago Di ntshegetse.
Mme tsa ka moso ga ke di Rapelele;
Ntshegetsa, Nkoga, Morena, Gompieno. Amen.
Moleti Mpolelela, A Moso Wa Sion’ Wa Sa?
A tshupo tsa go tla ga ’Gwe, Di phatsimile tseleng?
Moeti, e! tsoga, leba; ’Sedi le teng loaping;
Apara tsa go tsa nyalo, Bo sele tsoga; tsoga.
Moleti, Bona, Sedi Le Phatsima Tseleng Ya Go;
Tshupo di mo fatshing jotlhe, Tsa letsatsi je le tlang
Je ’tla reng naka lo lela, Lo tla tsosa ’fatshing; watleng,
Baitshepi ba ba robetseng Ba apare bosasweng.
Moleti Baka Lesedi Ja Ngwaga Wa Sabata;
Botlhe ba bolele gore Bogosi bo gaufi;
Moeng ke bona moseja, Kgalalelo Kananeng;
Saleme e kgalalelong, ’Seding je le kwa loaping.
Moleti Motsing Wa Gouda, O Ntse Troneng Ya Gagwe,
Ke Kgosi ya kwa Sione, O busa ka kagiso;
Kwa thabeng tse di leseding, Di phatsima botlalong.
Melatswana e phatsimang, Kwa go melang dithunya.
Moleti Fatshe Le Gaufi, Je Le Nang Le Maungo;
Kwa moseja, go gontle jang. Dithunyeng tsa Edene.
Go utlwala dikopelo, Di duma kwa loaping;
Bona bontsi, O ba reetse, Kgantele baeng ba koo.
Le Se Tshabeng Tse Di Godileng, Kgotsa E Se Lewatleng
E ka ne e se kwa pele ntweng: Morena O tla ntlhoka;
Mme lefa A ka mpiletsa kwa Tseleng ke sa di itseng.
Ke tla araba morena wa me,ke tla ya kwa O ratang teng
Ke tla ya kwa O ratang Morena,
Thabeng, lebaleng lewatleng:
Ke tla bua thato ya ’Go Morena,
Ke tla nna se O se ratang.
Gongwe Go Na Le Mafoko A Jeso O Ratang Ka A Bua,
Gongwe janong tseleng ya boleo Go na le motimedi.
Ao Mmoloki fa O ka nkgoga, Tseleng e e lefifi,
Ke tla bolela thomo ya Gago, Ke tla bua thato ya Go
Ke tla ya kwa O ratang Morena,
Thabeng, lebaleng lewatleng:
Ke tla bua thato ya ’Go Morena,
Ke tla nna se O se ratang.
Ruri Go Na Le Felo Gongwe Mo Thobong Ya Lefatshe,
Kwa nka dirang lobakanyana, Mme ke direla Jeso;
Mme tsotlhe ke di ba’a go Wena, Kea itse Wa nthata
Mme ke tla dira thato ya Gago, Ke tla nna jaaka O rata.
Ke tla ya kwa O ratang Morena,
Thabeng, lebaleng lewatleng:
Ke tla bua thato ya ’Go Morena,
Ke tla nna se O se ratang.

Ke Na Le Tsala Tota, Yo Rategang Thata,
O nthata ga kalo-kalo Ka boikanyego;
Ga nka ke ka tshel’a se teng, Ke rat’a nne gaufi,
Mme re tsamaya mmogo, Ene le nna.

’ Nno jo bontle, bo tlhokegang E’te nka nna ka metlha;

Lorato lwa ’Gwe lwa tshwaro, Lwa gapa pelo ya me.

Ke ba’a dibe mafutsana, Ke bona boikhutso;

O Ntshegofatse Mmoloki Ke Leta ’Naong Tsa Go.

Thata e mading, thata mading;
’Labe tsa sebe di a nyelela,
That’e gakgamatsang mading.
Go thata e dirang kgakgamatso Mading a Kwana;
Go thata e dirang kgakgamatso Mading mantle a Kwana.
O Ka Direla Jeso Kgosi’a Go?
Thata e mading, thata mading;
O ka tshela ka metlha mo pakong?
That’e gakgamatsang mading.
Go thata e dirang kgakgamatso Mading a Kwana;
Go thata e dirang kgakgamatso Mading mantle a Kwana.

title: Ga Go Kake Ga Nna Mogogoro O O Lefifi

lines: Ga Go Kake Ga Nna Mogogoro
O o lefifi fa Jeso A tla;
Fa Jeso A tla go phuthela kwa
Gae baratwi ba Gagwe.
Go phuthela baratwi
Ba Gagwe kwa legayeng,
Ga nko go nna fifi fa Jeso A tla,
Go phuthela ba ’Gwe gae.
Ga Go Kake Ga Nna Bofutsana
Ka lobaka lo Jeso O tla tlang;
Moso wa kgalalelo fa A tla
Go iphuthela baratwi.
Go phuthela baratwi
Ba Gagwe kwa legayeng,
Ga nko go nna fifi fa Jeso A tla,
Go phuthela ba ’Gwe gae.
Ga Go Kake Ga Nna Le Selelo
Ka lobaka lo Jeso O tla tlang;
Thobo e sego fa Jeso A tla
Go iphuthela baratwi.
Go phuthela baratwi
Ba Gagwe kwa legayeng,
Ga nko go nna fifi fa Jeso A tla,
Go phuthela ba ’Gwe gae.
Go Tla Opelelwa Tumediso
Ka lobaka lo Jeso O tla tlang;
Kopano e ntle fa Jeso A tla
Go iphuthela baratwi.
Go phuthela baratwi
Ba Gagwe kwa legayeng,
Ga nko go nna fifi fa Jeso A tla,
Go phuthela ba ’Gwe gae.

title: Tsala E E Molemo Ke Jeso

lines: Tsala E Molemo Ke Jeso,
Fa O tlelwa ke ditlalelo,
O tla fodisa pelo, O tla go fa nonofo,
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Tsala e molemo Jeso (kametlha),
Tsala e molemo Jeso, (mo tseleng),
Ene O tla go thusa, A utlwe fa O bitsa,
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Ke Bonye Tsala Mo Go Jeso,
O mpha kagiso le kgomotso;
Mabogong a ’Gwe ga ke boife bosula bope,
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Tsala e molemo Jeso (kametlha),
Tsala e molemo Jeso, (mo tseleng),
Ene O tla go thusa, A utlwe fa O bitsa,
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Lefa Ke Feta Bofutsaneng,
Metsing a tsididi a Jordan,
Ga ke tlhoke go boifa, ka Mmoloki O gaufi;
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Tsala e molemo Jeso (kametlha),
Tsala e molemo Jeso, (mo tseleng),
Ene O tla go thusa, A utlwe fa O bitsa,
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Mogang Re Tla Kopana Gae,
Le badumedi ba’ko pele,
Re tl’opela tsibogong, re mmaka le ka gale;
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Tsala e molemo Jeso (kametlha),
Tsala e molemo Jeso, (mo tseleng),
Ene O tla go thusa, A utlwe fa O bitsa,
Tsala e molemo ke Jeso.
Tlotlo Ka Tiro Tsa ’Gwe Tse Di Kgolo,
O re ratile A re fa Morwawe,
Yo O re intsheditseng seletlanyo,
A bulela bontlhe kgoro’a botshelo.
Lo bakeng Morena, Lefatshe le M’utlwe;
Lo bakeng Morena, Batho ba ipele;
Ao tlang kwa go Rara, ka Jeso Morwa
Lo mo tlotlele tiro tse di kgolo.
Ao Thekololo Tuelo Ya Madi,
Tsholofetso’a Modimo badumedi;
Motlodi yo’ maswe fa a dumela,
’Bakeng lo Jeso Oa mo itshwarela.
Lo bakeng Morena, Lefatshe le M’utlwe;
Lo bakeng Morena, Batho ba ipele;
Ao tlang kwa go Rara, ka Jeso Morwa
Lo mo tlotlele tiro tse di kgolo.
O Re Rutile A Dira Tse Kgolo,
Bogolo boipelo jwa rona Morweng;
Mme go tl’itsheka segolo bogolo
Phetolo’a rona fa re bona Jeso.
Lo bakeng Morena, Lefatshe le M’utlwe;
Lo bakeng Morena, Batho ba ipele;
Ao tlang kwa go Rara, ka Jeso Morwa
Lo mo tlotlele tiro tse di kgolo.
Go Boitshepo Morena Modimo.
Mosong o mogolo re tla G’opelela;
O boitshepo O tshwaro mme O thata,
Ke Modimo le ka bosakhutleng.
Baengele Ba Re, O Boitshepo,
Ba latlhela fatshe dirwalo tsa bone
Boidiidi bo obamela Wena,
Yo’ ntseng jana le ka bosakhutleng.
Wena O Boitshepo Le Lefifing,
Lefa matlho a batho a sa Gobone;
O ntse O le boitshepo O le Wesi,
Mo nonofong, loratong, boitshekong.

title: Ke Ne Ke Tshogile Pel’a Jehofa

lines: Ke Ne Ke Tshogile Pel’a Jehofa,
Ke le moleting mo sebe se ntsentseng
Ka goa Jehofa ke le botennyeng,
Yo’ nntsheditseng letsatsing ka bonolo.
O nntshitse mo seretseng sele,
A mpaya fa Lefikeng go nna;
O ba’a kopelo moyeng wa me,
Ke ya pako haleluja.
O Mpeile Lefikeng Pel’a Gagwe,
Dinao tsa me fano di tlhomame;
Ga nkake ka wa fa ke sa ntse fano
Ke eme go ba ke bona serwalo.
O nntshitse mo seretseng sele,
A mpaya fa Lefikeng go nna;
O ba’a kopelo moyeng wa me,
Ke ya pako haleluja.
O Mphile Kopelo E Ntsha Ya Pako,
Ke tla e opela ka nako tsotlhe;
Ke itumetse ke mo kgololegong,
Ke tla baka Morekolodi wa me.
O nntshitse mo seretseng sele,
A mpaya fa Lefikeng go nna;
O ba’a kopelo moyeng wa me,
Ke ya pako haleluja.
Ke Tla Opela Ka Tshwaro Ya Gagwe,
Ke tla Mmaka botlhe be ba Moitse;
Ke tla opela poloko ka gotlhe,
Botlhe ba utlwe ba ikanye Modimo.
O nntshitse mo seretseng sele,
A mpaya fa Lefikeng go nna;
O ba’a kopelo moyeng wa me,
Ke ya pako haleluja.
Jeso Mmoloki Nkgoga Sefefong Sa Botshelo;
Ke tlelwa ke dintelo, Fika je le sa bonweng;
Thuso e tswa go Wena; Jeso Mmoloki nkgoga.
Jaaka Mosadi Ngwana, Didimatsa Lewatle;
Dintelo dia ’Go utlwa; Fa O re, "Didimalang; "
O Kgosi ya lewatle, Jeso Mmoloki nkgoga.
Fa Ke Se Ke Tla Tlola, Go Kgorotlha Makhubu,
Gare ga me le ka’iso, Foo ke le fubeng sa ’Go,
A k’utlwe Wena O re, Se boife kea go goga.
Lo Gaseng Mafoko, Gotlhe Gotlhe Bathung,
Gotlhe kwa ba leng teng, Ba le bafutsaneng;
Botlhe Bakresete Ba bolele tumo
Mogomots’O tsile.
Mogomotsi O teng, Mogomotsi O teng,
Moya O’ Boitshepo, Tsholofetso’a Rara;
Lo gaseng mafoko, Gotlhe gotlhe bathung
Mogomotsi o teng.
’Sigo Bo Fetile, Moso O Fitlhile;
O sentse poifo, Le tshakgalo’a phefo,
Fa tsatsi ja gouda le tlhaba dithabeng;
Mogomotsi o fa.
Mogomotsi O teng, Mogomotsi O teng,
Moya O’ Boitshepo, Tsholofetso’a Rara;
Lo gaseng mafoko, Gotlhe gotlhe bathung
Mogomotsi o teng.
Bonang Kgosi Jeso O Na Le Phodiso,
Ya ba ba gapilweng, O tla le kgololo,
Mme go tswa kopelo, Ya phenyo go botlhe,
Mogomotsi o teng.
Mogomotsi O teng, Mogomotsi O teng,
Moya O’ Boitshepo, Tsholofetso’a Rara;
Lo gaseng mafoko, Gotlhe gotlhe bathung
Mogomotsi o teng.
Rato Lo ’Boitshepo, Loleme Lo Lwa Me,
Lo ka bolela jang, Ka ga tshegofatso,
Ka nna moleofi Ke tla tshwana Nae,
Mogomotsi o teng.
Mogomotsi O teng, Mogomotsi O teng,
Moya O’ Boitshepo, Tsholofetso’a Rara;
Lo gaseng mafoko, Gotlhe gotlhe bathung
Mogomotsi o teng.
Lo Opeleng Thata. Lo Tsholetseng Mantswe,
Baitshepi godimo, Ba tla lo fetola,
Mantsweng a lorato, Kopelo e sa sweng;
Mogomotsi o teng.
Mogomotsi O teng, Mogomotsi O teng,
Moya O’ Boitshepo, Tsholofetso’a Rara;
Lo gaseng mafoko, Gotlhe gotlhe bathung
Mogomotsi o teng.
Fatshing Ja Ditshaba, Kwa O Ileng Teng,
Utlwa lentswe ja re "Morwaaka."
Boya motimedi, Tla kwano gae,
O ntse O timetse koo; Tla gae, tla gae.
Fatsheng Ja Ditlala, O Idibala,
Tla boitumelong, Morwaaka.
Boya motimedi, Tla kwano gae,
O ntse O timetse koo; Tla gae, tla gae.
Tlogela Magodu, Le Bofutsana,
Go lwana mo pelong, Morwaaka.
Boya motimedi, Tla kwano gae,
O ntse O timetse koo; Tla gae, tla gae.
Bona Go Sa Butswe, O Sale Wa Me,
Ke sa go disitse, Morwaaka.
Boya motimedi, Tla kwano gae,
O ntse O timetse koo; Tla gae, tla gae.
O Ile Kgakala; A O Sa Ya Teng?
Tla O itshwaretswe, Morwaaka.
Boya motimedi, Tla kwano gae,
O ntse O timetse koo; Tla gae, tla gae.
Dijo Di Baakantswe Ga O Lebalwe,
Go teng boikhutso, Morwaaka.
Boya motimedi, Tla kwano gae,
O ntse O timetse koo; Tla gae, tla gae.
Ga O Na Ditsala, Le Tsholofelo,
Ke na le lorato, Morwaaka.
Boya motimedi, Tla kwano gae,
O ntse O timetse koo; Tla gae, tla gae.
Fa Jeso A Seba, Tla, Moleofi Tla.
Fa re go rapelela, Tla moleofi.
Ke nako ya go Mo rua, Tla moleofi,
Ke nako go M’itse Tla moleofi.
A O Wa Imelwa? Tla Moleofi.
Jeso O tla go thusa, Tla moleofi.
G’a na go go tsietsa, Tla moleofi,
O tla go rekolola, Tla moleofi.
Utlwa Thapelo Ya ’Gwe, Tla Moleofi,
Amogela lesego, Tla moleofi.
Fa Jes’a go sebetsa, Tla moleofi.
Fa re go rapelela, Tla moleofi.
Ke Go Swetse Wena, Ka Tsholola Madi,
Gore O bolokwe, O rudis’we losong,
Ka go ineela botshelo, Wena O mphile eng?
Ka go ineela botshelo, Wena O mphile eng?
Tlung Ya Rara Seding, Kgalalelo Ya Me,
Di saletse fifi, Batho ba timetseng;
Ke di tlogeletse wena, O ntlogeletse eng?
Ke di tlogeletse wena, O ntlogeletse eng?
Ka Bogela Wena, Go Gaisa Puo,
Mo kutlong botlhoko, Go go ntsha mo phupung,
Ke go belegetse tsotlhe, O mpelegetse eng?
Ke go belegetse tsotlhe, O mpelegetse eng?
Ke Bonye Yo O Pegilweng, Botlhokung Le Mading,
A nteba A sotlegile, Ke eme mokgorong.
Ga Nkake Ka E Lebala Yone Tebo Ele;
E ne ’kete e ntshekisa Ka loso lwa Gagwe.
Tebo Ya Bobedi Ya Re "Ke Go Itshwaretse;
Ke sule gore O tshele, Madi a a duetse
Lefa Ke Senola Loso Lwa Gagwe Ka Dibe,
Bosaitseweng jwa tshegofatso, Ke ishwaretse.
Didimalang Lotlhe, R’utlwa Go Seba,
Didimalang reetsang, Lo tsee mafoko.
Gatang ka bonolo, Morena O fa;
Gatang ka bonolo, Re atameleng.
T & B.
Lo gateng ka bonolo fa, Morena O fa;
Lo gateng ka bonolo, fa, Re atameleng.
Didimalang, Fano Go Boitshepo,
Mo sebesong seno, Sa thomo e ntle.
Gatang ka bonolo, Morena O fa;
Gatang ka bonolo, Re atameleng.
T & B.
Lo gateng ka bonolo fa, Morena O fa;
Lo gateng ka bonolo, fa, Re atameleng.
Didimalang, Fano, A Re Rapeleng,
Re utlwe Edene Lobakeng lona.
Gatang ka bonolo, Morena O fa;
Gatang ka bonolo, Re atameleng.
T & B.
Lo gateng ka bonolo fa, Morena O fa;
Lo gateng ka bonolo, fa, Re atameleng.
Didimalang, Kwalang Tshwaro Ya Gagwe;
Didimalang, mme lo Leteng Morena.
Gatang ka bonolo, Morena O fa;
Gatang ka bonolo, Re atameleng.
T & B.
Lo gateng ka bonolo fa, Morena O fa;
Lo gateng ka bonolo, fa, Re atameleng.
Go Tsamaya Le Modimo, Ka’isong Ya Godimo,
’Sedi go phatsima tseleng E nkisang go Kwana.
Boya Moya O Boitshepo Morongwa Yo’ Montle;
Ke ya di ila dibe tse Di Go lelekileng.
A Lobaka Lo Lontle Jang, Lwa Boitumelo.
Mme go setse mo go se kakeng ga ba ga tlatswa.
Sesetwa Se Ke Se Ratang, Lefa E Le Sefe,
O nthuse go se latlha ke Obamele Wena.
Kreste O Letlatse Dibeng, Mmolok’o Gokgamatsang.
Re rekolotse O duetse, Mmolok’o gakgamatsang.
Mmoloki yo’gakgamatsang ke Jeso wa me,
Mmoloki yo gakgamatsang Jeso wa me.
Ke Mmakela Madi A Ntlhatswang, Mmolok’o
gakgamatsang
Yo ntetlantseng le Modimo, Molok’o gakgamatsang.
Mmoloki yo’gakgamatsang ke Jeso wa me,
Mmoloki yo gakgamatsang Jeso wa me.
O Ntlhapisitse Mo Pelong, Mmolok’o Gakgamatsang.
Mme ke Ene yo’e busang; Mmolok’o gakgamatsang.
Mmoloki yo’gakgamatsang ke Jeso wa me,
Mmoloki yo gakgamatsang Jeso wa me.
O Tsamaya Gaufi Le Nna, Mmolok’o Gakgamatsang.
Mme O ntshegetsa ka metlha, Mmolok’o gakgamatsang.
Mmoloki yo’gakgamatsang ke Jeso wa me,
Mmoloki yo gakgamatsang Jeso wa me.
O Nnaya Thata Ya Phenyo, Mmolok’o Gakgamatsang.
Le phenyo nakong ya teko, Mmolok’o gakgamatsang.
Mmoloki yo’gakgamatsang ke Jeso wa me,
Mmoloki yo gakgamatsang Jeso wa me.
Ke Mo Neile Pelo Ya Me, Mmolok’o Gakgamatsang.
Fatshe ga le na kabelo Mmolok’o gakgamatsang.
Mmoloki yo’gakgamatsang ke Jeso wa me,
Mmoloki yo gakgamatsang Jeso wa me.
Re Tla Nelwa Ke Masego, Tsholofetso’a Lorato;
Dipaka tsa tapologo Tse di tswang kwa Mmoloking.
Go na masego, (Alt.T.&B.Marothodi a sego?)
Masego re’a senka; Re welwa ke tshegofatso,
Mme re lopa masego.
Re Tla Nelwa Ke Masego-a Mantle A A Tsosang;
Dithabeng le megogorong, Tumo ya pula e ntsi.
Go na masego, (Alt.T.&B.Marothodi a sego?)
Masego re’a senka; Re welwa ke tshegofatso,
Mme re lopa masego.
Re Tla Nelwa Ke Masego; A Romele Morena;
Janong re fa tapologo, Tla janong O itlotle.
Go na masego, (Alt.T.&B.Marothodi a sego?)
Masego re’a senka; Re welwa ke tshegofatso,
Mme re lopa masego.
Re Tla Nelwa Ke Masego; A A We Gompieno,
Ka r’ipolela Modimong, Re bitsa kwa go Jeso.
Go na masego, (Alt.T.&B.Marothodi a sego?)
Masego re’a senka; Re welwa ke tshegofatso,
Mme re lopa masego.

title: Kagiso E E Monate? Neo Ya Modimo

lines: Go Tsena Mo Pelong Ya Me, (Ya Me)
Boitumelo le boikhutso, (khutso),
Ke e opela gape gape, Kagiso ya Modimo.
Kagiso neo e tswang kwa godimo,
Kgakgamatso ya kagiso, Kagiso ya Modimo.
Ka Jeso Kagiso E Teng, (E Teng),
Molato wa me O duetse’ (duetse),
Ga go motheo o sele, Wa neo ya lorato.
Kagiso neo e tswang kwa godimo,
Kgakgamatso ya kagiso, Kagiso ya Modimo.
Ke Sena Go Rwesa Jeso, (Jeso),
Ke bonye kagiso pelong, (pelong),
Khumo ya sego go Ene, Kagiso e monate.
Kagiso neo e tswang kwa godimo,
Kgakgamatso ya kagiso, Kagiso ya Modimo.
Go Jeso Kagisong Ke Ntse, (Ke Ntse),
Ka ke ntse ke le gaufi, (gaufi),
Ke bona kagiso fela, Lorato lwa Modimo.
Kagiso neo e tswang kwa godimo,
Kgakgamatso ya kagiso, Kagiso ya Modimo.
Morekolodi Wa Me, O Kopelo Ya Me,
Mmoloki Monkgomotsi, Ke le mafutsaneng.
Morekolodi wa me, Ke opela Wena;
Ga ke na tsala epe, E e tshwanang le Wena.
O Tsholofelo Ya Me, Ka Dingwaga Tsotlhe,
Fa lefifi le mpipa, Keledi di rotha.
Morekolodi wa me, Ke opela Wena;
Ga ke na tsala epe, E e tshwanang le Wena.
Ke Ikanya Mmoloki Tsala Ya Me Ruri,
Gonne ke ya Go rata Bogolo go tsotlhe.
Morekolodi wa me, Ke opela Wena;
Ga ke na tsala epe, E e tshwanang le Wena.
O Boitumelo Jwa Me Fatshing Je Ja Sebe,
O tla nna boitumelo Jwa me legodimong.
Morekolodi wa me, Ke opela Wena;
Ga ke na tsala epe, E e tshwanang le Wena.
A Jeso’a Tlhokomela Fa Ke Futsafaletse Kopelo?
Ke le bothateng, Mo patikegong, Mme ke lapis’wa ke tsela?
E oa tlhokomela k’itse, O itse futsana jwa me;
Metlheng ya bothata, Kea itse Mmoloki Wa tlhokomela.
A Jeso’a Tlhokomela Fa Tsela Ya Me E Le Lefifi?
Fa letsatsi le phirima ’sigo, A O nna fa go gaufi?
E oa tlhokomela k’itse, O itse futsana jwa me;
Metlheng ya bothata, Kea itse Mmoloki Wa tlhokomela.
A Jeso’a Tlhokomela Fa Ke Paletswe Ke Thaelo’thata?
Mo boputsaneng, Ke se na thuso Ke lela bosigo jotlhe.
E oa tlhokomela k’itse, O itse futsana jwa me;
Metlheng ya bothata, Kea itse Mmoloki Wa tlhokomela.
A Jeso’a Tlhokomela Fa Ke Re "Sala Sentle Moratwa,"
Pelo’a me e batla go phatloga, A ke lefela? Wa bona?
E oa tlhokomela k’itse, O itse futsana jwa me;
Metlheng ya bothata, Kea itse Mmoloki Wa tlhokomela.
Legae Je Go Seng Phetogo, Setlhabi Le Bofutsana;
E, ke legae ja masego; Ke mang yo o sa le rateng?
Leta, mme O se ngongorege,

Bojosing? Nnyaa Ga Ke ’Si Jeso’ Na Le Nna;

Ga go tsala? Nnyaa ’Teng, Jeso Tsala ya me;
Ke’ fetoga mme O nna jalo go ya bokhutlong.
Nnyaa ga ke esi, nnyaa ga ke esi;
O solofeditse gore ga A ntlogele bojosing. (gabedi)
T&B.Nnyaa, nnyaa, ga ke esi Nnyaa, nnyaa, ga ke esi;
O solofeditse gore ga A ntlogele bojosing. (boela khorase)
Ke Lapile? Nnyaa Fa Ke Le Fubeng Sa ’Gwe;
Ke mo boitumelong, Le mo boikhutsong.
Ga ke na thuso? E, Mme k’ikaegile,
Mabogong a that’a Jeso, Mme O mpolokile.
Nnyaa ga ke esi, nnyaa ga ke esi;
O solofeditse gore ga A ntlogele bojosing. (gabedi)
T&B.Nnyaa, nnyaa, ga ke esi Nnyaa, nnyaa, ga ke esi;
O solofeditse gore ga A ntlogele bojosing. (boela khorase)
Ke Letile? E, O Re Ke Lete Tisong;
Ke gakgamala gantsi, Keng se diang Morena.
Boitumelo jo Bo se nang mafoko,
Motheo o o thata Boipelo Moreneng.
Nnyaa ga ke esi, nnyaa ga ke esi;
O solofeditse gore ga A ntlogele bojosing. (gabedi)

Jeso Rato Lwa ’Go O Lo Mphile,

K’obama loratong, Ke dira ikano,

Boutlwelong Botlhoko, Wa Nthapelela,

Nthusa mo mokgorong, Ke bolela rato,

O Mphe Pelo Tota, Tshwano Sa’go,
Gore go bonale mo malatsing;
Tiro ya lorato, Le ya Pelonomi,

title: Motheo Wa Phuthego Ke Jeso Morena

lines: Motheo Wa Phuthego Ke Jeso Morena,
Ke lobopo lo losa, Ka madi le metse;
O tsile go e senka Go nna boitshepo,
Ka madi O rekile A ba A e swela.
Ba Ba Tswang Tshikeng Tsotlhe, Botlhe Bangwe Fela,
Morena mongwe fela, Tumelo, Go tsalwa;
